translation.en: [Stacy] All across the world, and maybe ever since the beginning of time,
translation.zh: 或许自开天辟地时起 全球各地

translation.en: different cultures had different ways of celebrating a kid coming of age.
translation.zh: 不同的文化运用不同的方式 来庆祝孩子成年

translation.en: There's the quinceañera.
translation.zh: 比如15岁少女成年礼

translation.en: -There's Sweet 16. -[indistinct laughter]
translation.zh: 甜蜜的16岁

translation.en: [Stacy] There's also something called land diving.
translation.zh: 还有一种名为“路潜”的成年礼

translation.en: My dad told me that in the Brazilian Amazon,
translation.zh: 我爸爸说 在巴西的亚马逊地区

translation.en: there's this thing called a bullet ant initiation
translation.zh: 有一种名为“子弹蚁仪式”的活动

translation.en: where fire ants crawl all over your hands and bite you.
translation.zh: 人们让火蚁爬满你的双手 咬嗜你

translation.en: And if you can handle the pain, you're ready to be a man.
translation.zh: 如果你能承受住这种痛苦 你就准备好做成年人了

translation.en: I told him if he thinks that sounds bad,
translation.zh: 我告诉他说 如果他觉得这就够糟了

translation.en: try being a girl in middle school.
translation.zh: 那不如试试在中学里当女生

translation.en: [Stacy] Everyone has their own thing.
translation.zh: 每种文化都有各自的成年礼

translation.en: And we have ours.
translation.zh: 我们也有我们的

translation.en: [Stacy, narrating] At a Bar or Bat Mitzvah, when you're 13,
translation.zh: 犹太教成年礼是你到了13岁时

translation.en: you step before friends, family, and elders of the temple
translation.zh: 你的朋友、家人 以及圣殿的长老们坐在你面前

translation.en: and read from the Torah.
translation.zh: 听你诵读《妥拉》

translation.en: Then, there's usually a party.
translation.zh: 之后通常会举办一个派对

translation.en: All right, mishpachah,
translation.zh: 好了 家人们

translation.en: please say hello to our newest and most fabulous adult,
translation.zh: 有请我们最了不起的新晋成年人

translation.en: Stacy Friedman!
translation.zh: 斯泰西费曼！

translation.en: [Stacy, narrating] Your Bat Mitzvah is the first day of your adult life,
translation.zh: 你的成年礼是成年生活的第一天

translation.en: and everyone knows an iconic adult life hinges on how it starts.
translation.zh: 大家都知道 了不起的成年生活取决于它如何开始

translation.en: [Stacy, continuing] The theme.
translation.zh: 派对主题

translation.en: -The food. -[girl] Can I get one?
translation.zh: -食物 -能给我一个吗？

translation.en: [Stacy] The entrance video.
translation.zh: 登场影片

translation.en: It all tells a story.
translation.zh: 这些都会讲述一个故事

translation.en: Who do I want to be?
translation.zh: 我想成为什么人？

translation.en: Will I have amazing lifelong friends like Lydia Rodriguez Katz?
translation.zh: 我是否会拥有 莉迪亚罗德里格斯卡茨 这样了不起的终身挚友？

translation.en: Nothing before that day matters because that was the old you, the kid you.
translation.zh: 这一天之前发生的任何事都不重要 因为那是原来的你、孩子时期的你

translation.en: Now you're an adult.
translation.zh: 现在你成年了

translation.en: So who cares if two years ago you accidentally peed yourself
translation.zh: 所以哪怕两年前 你在校外旅行时不小心尿了自己一身

translation.en: during a field trip and had to get a secret dry pants delivery
translation.zh: 所以哪怕两年前 你在校外旅行时不小心尿了自己一身 不得不求助你了不起的姐姐萝妮 偷偷送干裤子 又有谁在意？

translation.en: from your awesome older sister Ronnie?
translation.zh: 不得不求助你了不起的姐姐萝妮 偷偷送干裤子 又有谁在意？

translation.en: This is a hypothetical situation of course.
translation.zh: 当然了 这只是假想情景

translation.en: Go Stacy! That's my sister!
translation.zh: 加油 斯泰西 那是我妹妹！

translation.en: [Stacy] And what better way to kick off adulthood
translation.zh: 而展开成年生活的最佳方式

translation.en: than with the hottest guy in seventh grade?
translation.zh: 莫过于与七年级最帅的男生在一起

translation.en: Andy, what are you doing?
translation.zh: 安迪 你要干什么？

translation.en: Stacy, I've loved you since the first time I saw you in the temple's Purim Pageant.
translation.zh: 斯泰西 我在圣殿的普珥节庆典中 对你一见钟情

translation.en: You were the finest Queen Esther I ever laid eyes on.
translation.zh: 你是我见过的最棒的以斯帖皇后

translation.en: Is it okay if I officially signify me being your boyfriend by giving you a kiss?
translation.zh: 我能否给你一个吻 以正式成为你的男朋友？

translation.en: Consent given, Andy Goldfarb.
translation.zh: 我同意 安迪戈法布

translation.en: -[knocking on door] -[Bree] Stacy!
translation.zh: 斯泰西！

translation.en: [Bree] Stacy, we're gonna be late. Let's go.
translation.zh: 斯泰西 我们要迟到了 走吧

translation.en: -[knocking on door] -[Bree] I know you can hear me.
translation.zh: 我知道你听得见

translation.en: [sighing] One second, I'm flossing like you tell me to!
translation.zh: 稍等 我听你的话 在用牙线剔牙呢！

translation.en: -Now I'm gurgling. -Well, hurry up!
translation.zh: -我现在在漱口！ -好吧 快点！

translation.en: -You too, Ronnie! -[Ronnie] I'm ready!
translation.zh: -还有你 萝妮 -我准备好了

translation.en: You always say that. Never ready.
translation.zh: 你总是这么说 但从没准备好过

translation.en: -Ugh. Fine you got me. I'm not ready. -[Danny] Yankees are winning.
translation.zh: 好吧 你说对了 我还没准备好 洋基队在领先呢

translation.en: [Bree] That's what you're wearing?
translation.zh: 你要穿这身衣服？

translation.en: Yeah, I don't even know who this kid is. I'm not gonna wear a suit.
translation.zh: 我都不认识这孩子是谁 我可不会穿西服

translation.en: It's a junior high friend. We have to get to know those parents too.
translation.zh: 是初中朋友 我们也得认识一下他们的父母

translation.en: I don't want to get to know 'em. I liked when they were little.
translation.zh: 我不想认识这些人 我还是喜欢她们小时候

translation.en: All we had to know was them and the trampoline park guy.
translation.zh: 只需要认识她们 和蹦床公园的那家伙就够了

translation.en: Ronnie, we're gonna be late!
translation.zh: 萝妮 我们要迟到了！

translation.en: I'll be ready when Stacy's ready, Mom. It's all good.
translation.zh: 斯泰西准备好时 我也能准备好 妈妈 没事的

translation.en: Hey, Andy, of course I'll share a matzo ball soup with you.
translation.zh: 嘿 安迪 我当然愿意和你一起分食丸子汤

translation.en: Hi, Andy. I like your yarmulke.
translation.zh: 嗨 安迪 我喜欢你的圆顶小帽

translation.en: I didn't know you were going to the Bat Mitzvah tonight, that's cool.
translation.zh: 我都不知道 你今晚要去成年礼呢 真不错

translation.en: Honey, what are you looking for?
translation.zh: 亲爱的 你在找什么？

translation.en: I can't find my earring.
translation.zh: 我找不到我的耳环了

translation.en: Oh, good luck. Keep looking, baby. Keep looking. Take your time.
translation.zh: 祝你好运 继续找吧 宝贝 继续找 慢慢来

translation.en: Stacy!
translation.zh: 斯泰西！

translation.en: Sorry, I'm coming!
translation.zh: 抱歉 我这就来！

translation.en: [Ronnie] Those are cool.
translation.zh: 很酷嘛

translation.en: -Mom will never let you wear them, though. -[Stacy] She won't even notice.
translation.zh: 不过妈妈不会让你穿的 她根本不会注意到

translation.en: And if she does, I'll put on a sad show for Dad.
translation.zh: 如果她看到了 我就苦求爸爸

translation.en: Oh, she'll notice. She'll hate them.
translation.zh: 她会注意到的 她肯定不喜欢

translation.en: And Dad will feel bad, but ultimately be too afraid to stand up to Mom.
translation.zh: 爸爸会可怜你 但最终因为害怕 也不敢反抗妈妈

translation.en: I've known them longer than you.
translation.zh: 我认识他们的时间可比你长

translation.en: Um, excuse me, what are those things on your feet?
translation.zh: 不好意思 你脚上穿的是什么？

translation.en: Lydia's mom bought us each a pair, so we could twin.
translation.zh: 莉迪亚的妈妈给我们各买了一双 让我们“闺蜜搭配”

translation.en: What's twin?
translation.zh: “闺蜜搭配”是什么？

translation.en: Wearing the same thing. It's very seventh grade.
translation.zh: 穿一样的东西 七年级小孩的幼稚活动

translation.en: Take them off. You look like a stripper.
translation.zh: 脱下来 你看着像是脱衣舞娘

translation.en: -Mom, you can't say that. -Yeah, Mom. You're gonna get cancelled.
translation.zh: -妈妈 你可不能说这种话 -对 妈妈 你会被抵制的

translation.en: Oh boy.
translation.zh: 天啊

translation.en: Take them off or lose your phone.
translation.zh: 脱下来 不然没收手机

translation.en: Oh.
translation.zh: 哦

translation.en: No, you can't. Just take them off.
translation.zh: 不行 不能穿 脱下来吧

translation.en: [Bree] Everyone in the car.
translation.zh: 所有人都上车

translation.en: Thirty seconds or there's going to be no food left at this thing.
translation.zh: 三十秒内出发 不然聚餐食物都要被吃完了

translation.en: You're the one who's not ready. We're ready.
translation.zh: 没准备好的是你 我们准备好了

translation.en: -I don't know where my earring is. -Babe, did you look everywhere? Honestly?
translation.zh: 我找不到耳环了 亲爱的 你真的到处都找了吗？

translation.en: 'Cause if you look hard enough, you can find it.
translation.zh: 因为只要你努力找 肯定能找到的

translation.en: Why would you do that to me?
translation.zh: 你为什么要这样对我？

translation.en: Because I knew the girls needed more time.
translation.zh: 因为我知道姑娘们还需要一些时间

translation.en: I also… I don't want to go to this thing at all.
translation.zh: 我呢 我根本就不想去参加

translation.en: -[Bree] You guys are the worst. -Yeah. I love you. Okay.
translation.zh: -你们简直最差劲了 -对 我爱你 好吧

translation.en: Come on, Mom, just let her wear the shoes. It's not fair to Lydia to make her wear them by herself.
translation.zh: 妈妈 就让她穿吧 不然莉迪亚一个人穿 太不公平了

translation.en: Okay. You're going to hate them in two minutes.
translation.zh: 好吧 两分钟后 你就会讨厌这双鞋了

translation.en: You're welcome.
translation.zh: 不客气

translation.en: Thank you. Love you.
translation.zh: 谢谢 爱你

translation.en: -Whoa. Ow! -[woman] Stacy!
translation.zh: -哇 -斯泰西！

translation.en: I'm coming! Ugh, fine.
translation.zh: 这就来！唉 好吧

translation.en: [man] Move, child!
translation.zh: 快点 孩子

translation.en: [Stacy] Coming, sorry!
translation.zh: 来了 抱歉！

translation.en: -[Bree] Oh yeah! -[Danny] Oh, nice job.
translation.zh: -这就对了 -好样的

translation.en: [Bree] Taking after Dad with the dress clothes and sneakers.
translation.zh: 和爸爸的风格一样 裙子配球鞋

translation.en: [Danny] Comfort always comes first, sweetie.
translation.zh: 舒适永远排第一位 宝贝

translation.en: -There she is! -[Bree] She's limping. Hi, sweetheart!
translation.zh: 她来了！ 一瘸一拐的 嗨 亲爱的

translation.en: -[Stacy] Hi, Lyd! -Lydia, Lydia encyclopedia.
translation.zh: -嗨 小莉 -莉迪亚 莉迪亚小学霸

translation.en: [Lydia] Hi, guys!
translation.zh: -嗨 各位！ -她来了

translation.en: Nice shoes. You look super cute, Lydia.
translation.zh: 鞋子很靓 看着超可爱 莉迪亚

translation.en: Oh, thanks, Ron Ron. Stacy and I are twinning.
translation.zh: 谢谢 萝萝 斯泰西和我在“闺蜜搭配”

translation.en: We heard. Hmm. Not anymore. [chuckling]
translation.zh: -我们听说了 -现在可不是了

translation.en: -You took yours off. -I got you.
translation.zh: -你给换下来了 -我给你带了

translation.en: -Oh, thank you. I couldn't feel my feet. -Mom and Dad know we're taking you?
translation.zh: 谢谢 我的脚都麻了 爸妈知道我们带你去？

translation.en: Well, I told my mom, and then she told Dad's lawyer, so we're good to go.
translation.zh: 我跟妈妈说了 她通知了爸爸的律师 所以没问题

translation.en: Nice!
translation.zh: 很好！

translation.en: Ugh! Dad, can you turn this song off? It's embarrassing.
translation.zh: 爸爸 你能关掉这首歌吗？太丢人了

translation.en: Why is it embarrassing? No one's around to hear it.
translation.zh: 有什么可丢人的？又没外人听

translation.en: Oh my God! You're humiliating me!
translation.zh: 我的老天 你这是在羞辱我！

translation.en: All right! I'll turn it off. Jesus.
translation.zh: 好啦 我给关掉 天啊

translation.en: I turned it off, guys! What are we still upset about?
translation.zh: 我已经关掉了 你们还在难过什么？

translation.en: Their watching sad videos to see who can cry first.
translation.zh: 她们在看伤心视频 看谁先哭

translation.en: You're trying to cry. That is so bizarre.
translation.zh: 你们在逼自己哭 真是太奇怪了

translation.en: Ugh! You're so freaking good at this game. I hate it.
translation.zh: 你玩这个游戏简直太厉害了 真不爽

translation.en: Everybody in this house needs a shrink.
translation.zh: 这家里的每个人都需要心理医生

translation.en: Yeah, you need two.
translation.zh: 没错 你需要两个

translation.en: Ten.
translation.zh: 十个

translation.en: [chuckling] That's nice. Everyone be normal. We're going to temple.
translation.zh: 真不错 大家都正常点 我们要去圣殿

translation.en: Here's your music.
translation.zh: 这是你们的音乐

translation.en: [DJ] Make some noise, mishpachah!
translation.zh: 给我点欢呼声 家人们！

translation.en: It's Devin's B'nai Mitzvah!
translation.zh: 这是德文的成年礼！

translation.en: They're becoming an adult. Let's hear it for Devin!
translation.zh: 他们要成年了 我们为德文欢呼吧！

translation.en: We've been pushing all the teachers to assign more homework.
translation.zh: 我们一直在敦促所有老师 多布置一些作业

translation.en: If we want to prepare our kids for this world, we gotta start 'em early.
translation.zh: 要想让孩子们为这个世界做好准备 我们就得早点开始

translation.en: India's been kicking our ass.
translation.zh: 印度一直比我们更优秀

translation.en: -I'm always telling my son, Marvin-- -[Danny] I'm sorry.
translation.zh: -我总是跟我的儿子马文说 他… -抱歉

translation.en: Can I interrupt you for one second? I think this is on behalf of the table.
translation.zh: 能打断你一下吗？ 我想为这桌的所有人说两句

translation.en: We came here to enjoy chicken and fish tonight
translation.zh: 我们今晚是来享受美味鸡肉和鱼肉的

translation.en: and maybe have a few drinks, so could you stop talking?
translation.zh: 说不定还会喝几杯小酒 所以能拜托你别说了吗？

translation.en: [Danny] Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: Wow!
translation.zh: 哇！

translation.en: This is such a classic. Have you watched Leprechaun in the Hood?
translation.zh: 这部电影真是经典 你看过《鬼精灵：跳街舞》吗？

translation.en: Dude, that's a masterpiece.
translation.zh: -老兄 那部可是杰作 -我们知道

translation.en: We know. We've seen it. It was awful. Can you just let us watch our movie?
translation.zh: 我们看过 很烂的 可以让我们专心看电影吗？

translation.en: Bye!
translation.zh: 再见！

translation.en: That hurt.
translation.zh: 好伤人啊

translation.en: -We've seen that? -No.
translation.zh: -我们看过吗？ -没有

translation.en: Okay, I love this Carnivale theme,
translation.zh: 好吧 我很爱这个嘉年华主题派对

translation.en: but your Candyland theme is gonna be the best of the year.
translation.zh: 但你的糖果乐园主题派对 肯定是全年最棒的

translation.en: Oh, until your New York theme puts the entire school to shame!
translation.zh: 然后你的纽约主题派对 会让整个学校的人蒙羞！

translation.en: If my parents let me have it. Did your dad talk to DJ Schmuley yet?
translation.zh: 前提是我爸妈同意 你爸爸和史姆利唱片骑师聊过了吗？

translation.en: Let me hear you scream, "DJ Schmuley is my king!"
translation.zh: 让我听到你们高喊 “史姆利唱片骑师是我的王！”

translation.en: [crowd] DJ Schmuley is my king!
translation.zh: 史姆利唱片骑师是我的王！

translation.en: -He's already been booked. We got it! -Sweet!
translation.zh: -已经订好他了 我们没问题的！ -好极了！

translation.en: Looking nice, ladies!
translation.zh: 看起来不错嘛 女士们！

translation.en: -[Lydia] Hi, guys. -Hi.
translation.zh: -嗨 各位 -嗨

translation.en: Can you believe we're becoming adults this year?
translation.zh: 你们敢相信我们今年都要成年了吗？

translation.en: -No. -[Nikki] Yeah.
translation.zh: -不敢 -是啊

translation.en: My mom actually let me shave my legs this afternoon.
translation.zh: 我妈今天下午允许我刮腿毛了

translation.en: First time. So magical.
translation.zh: 第一次 太神奇了

translation.en: Oh, I'm so proud of you, Nikki!
translation.zh: 我真为你骄傲 妮基！

translation.en: It burns so bad right now, like somebody wiped wasabi all over my shins.
translation.zh: 现在痛得好厉害 感觉有人在我的小腿上抹了芥末

translation.en: Oh.
translation.zh: 噢

translation.en: Oh my God.
translation.zh: 我的天啊

translation.en: [Tara] Why do Kym, Anya, and Megan always look so cool?
translation.zh: 为什么金、安雅和梅根总是这么酷？

translation.en: Are those birds rescued?
translation.zh: 这些是被救助的鸟吗？

translation.en: -Say what? -They better be.
translation.zh: -什么？ -最好是这样

translation.en: -They scare me. -Yeah, you know what else is scary?
translation.zh: -她们好吓人 -对 你知道还有什么很吓人吗？

translation.en: Nikki's mom is allowing Ronnie and Zaara to drink alcohol!
translation.zh: 妮基的妈妈在让萝妮和扎拉喝酒

translation.en: One, two, three. Woo!
translation.zh: 一 二 三 哇！

translation.en: -Okay, let me hide those. -[Ronnie coughing]
translation.zh: 好了 我把酒杯藏起来

translation.en: Yeah, she's trying to be like a cool mom. It's really weird.
translation.zh: 是啊 她在努力当酷妈 真的很奇怪

translation.en: [Andy] Let's go!
translation.zh: 我们来吧！

translation.en: Oh my God, Andy Goldfarb looks so cute tonight.
translation.zh: 天啊 安迪戈法布今晚超级可爱

translation.en: Do you realize that one day he will be mine,
translation.zh: 你知道么？ 总有一天 他会是我的 你也会有一位很酷的男朋友

translation.en: and you will have a cool boyfriend too,
translation.zh: 总有一天 他会是我的 你也会有一位很酷的男朋友

translation.en: and then we'll have a joint wedding and move to adjoining lofts in Tribeca?
translation.zh: 到时我们要举行联合婚礼 然后搬到翠贝卡区的相邻小宅？

translation.en: In Taylor Swift's building?
translation.zh: 在泰勒斯威夫特住的楼里？

translation.en: -Yeah! -Yeah!
I'm gonna talk to him.
translation.zh: 我要去跟他聊天

translation.en: -[Lydia] What? -[Stacy] I'm ready.
translation.zh: -什么？ -我准备好了

translation.en: You should, Stace. Yeah, you got this.
translation.zh: 你该去 小斯 你没问题的

translation.en: Come with me, please.
translation.zh: 拜托跟我一起来

translation.en: -Yeah. -Let's go.
translation.zh: -好 -走吧

translation.en: Go, go, go. You got this.
translation.zh: 没问题 我们可以的

translation.en: Gang way!
translation.zh: 麻烦让一让！

translation.en: Hey, wait for me!
translation.zh: 喂 等等我！

translation.en: -No! You're embarrassing me. -Yes!
translation.zh: -别这样 你害我丢脸啦 -太棒了！

translation.en: [Mateo] Hey, Stacy.
translation.zh: 嘿 斯泰西

translation.en: I like your kicks.
translation.zh: 我喜欢你的鞋子

translation.en: Andy, smile!
translation.zh: 安迪 笑一个！

translation.en: [girl] Finish him!
translation.zh: 干掉他！

translation.en: Why would Mateo do that? That was so uncalled for.
translation.zh: 马提奥为什么要那样？真没必要

translation.en: Oh, sorry.
translation.zh: 哦 抱歉

translation.en: Completely. Sorry.
translation.zh: 没错 抱歉

translation.en: Why does Andy hang out with that Italian exchange student anyway?
translation.zh: 话说安迪为什么 要和那个意大利交换生一起玩？

translation.en: I think he's Ecuadorian.
translation.zh: 他好像是厄瓜多尔人

translation.en: Whatever. I heard he has a girlfriend back home. She's in college.
translation.zh: 随便吧 听说他在家乡有个女友 都上大学了

translation.en: Um, no. I think that's, like, illegal.
translation.zh: 不会 我觉得那应该是违法的

translation.en: -Oh my God! -[crowd gasping]
translation.zh: 天啊！

translation.en: -[Zaara] Sorry. -What's wrong with you?
translation.zh: -抱歉 -你怎么回事？

translation.en: -Why would you do that? So embarrassing. -I'm sorry.
translation.zh: -干什么叫这么大声？好丢脸 -对不起

translation.en: All right, everybody, make some noise!
translation.zh: 好了 大家一起欢呼吧！

translation.en: Come on, let's dance, everybody! Come on!
translation.zh: 来吧 大家一起跳舞 来吧！

translation.en: -[Schmuley] Let me hear you scream, Schmu… -[crowd] Ley!
translation.zh: -现在让我听到你们高喊 史姆… -利！

translation.en: -Schmu-- -[crowd] Ley!
translation.zh: -史姆… -利！

translation.en: -Schmu, Schmu-- -[crowd] Ley!
translation.zh: -史姆… -利

translation.en: Why does everybody like this idiot?
translation.zh: 为什么大家都喜欢这个白痴？

translation.en: -He's the best! -The best.
translation.zh: -他是最棒的！ -可不是么

translation.en: -You've been officially Schmulitized! -[crowd cheering]
translation.zh: 你们正式归为史姆利教徒了！

translation.en: [Stacy] Thank you family for joining us today.
translation.zh: 家人们 谢谢你们今天的参与

translation.en: Let me take you all on a journey.
translation.zh: 我来带领大家一起踏上一段旅程

translation.en: Picture this. My entrance video starts…
translation.zh: 想象一下 我的登场影片以此开场

translation.en: Which, as we know, sets the tone for the entire Bat Mitzvah.
translation.zh: 大家都知道 这为整个成年礼定下了基调

translation.en: -[Stacy] Ugh, Ronnie! -Girls, come on.
translation.zh: -萝妮！ -姑娘们 拜托

translation.en: Anyway, I descend the stairs of a private yacht on the Hudson River
translation.zh: 好了 哈德逊河上 我走下一艘私人游艇的阶梯

translation.en: to cheers and fireworks.
translation.zh: 迎接众人的欢呼和烟火

translation.en: Whoa.
translation.zh: 哇

translation.en: Then! Oh, who's that zipping by on a jet ski?
translation.zh: 然后 那个坐着摩托艇飞快驰来的是谁？

translation.en: Why that's international recording artist Olivia Rodrigo.
translation.zh: 原来是国际唱片艺人 奥莉维亚罗德里戈

translation.en: Wait, how we gonna pay for this? Oh, we have ideas.
translation.zh: -等等 我们怎么请得起？ -我们有主意

translation.en: They… they got ideas, honey.
translation.zh: 她们有主意 亲爱的

translation.en: [Lydia] Okay.
translation.zh: 好了

translation.en: No. Wait. No. The old guy was supposed to be for your dad.
translation.zh: 不对 等等 不对 那个老家伙是给你爸准备的

translation.en: Oh no. Just keep going.
translation.zh: 不要 继续吧

translation.en: -There. -Okay.
translation.zh: -好了 -好

translation.en: Oh, this is amazing.
translation.zh: （斯泰西大学基金） 太精彩了

translation.en: -Shut up, Ronnie. -No, you shut up.
translation.zh: -闭嘴 萝妮 -不要 你才闭嘴

translation.en: I'll kill you, Ronnie.
translation.zh: 我要杀了你 萝妮

translation.en: Not if I stab you first!
translation.zh: 除非我先刺死你！

translation.en: Oh, that's… that's nice.
translation.zh: 真是好极了

translation.en: Oh my God, this is important! I'm becoming a freaking woman, everyone!
translation.zh: 老天 这可是重要活动 我可是要成为女人了 各位！

translation.en: Okay, woman. All you should worry about right now is your mitzvah project
translation.zh: 好吧 女人 你现在要操心的 就是你的成年礼善行

translation.en: and practicing your Haftarah.
translation.zh: 练习你的先知书选段诵读

translation.en: -[Bree] Mm-hmm. -That's not important!
translation.zh: 那不重要！

translation.en: I mean, it is important to you and other old people and God and stuff.
translation.zh: 我是说 那对你们这些老年人 还有上帝什么的很重要

translation.en: But to me, the party is important.
translation.zh: 但对我来说 派对很重要

translation.en: If this doesn't go well, I could end up like Kate Kossman.
translation.zh: 如果不能顺利进行 我可能会变成凯特科斯曼那样

translation.en: You are not gonna end up like Kate Kossman.
translation.zh: 你不会变成凯特科斯曼那样的

translation.en: Who's Kate Kossman?
translation.zh: 凯特科斯曼是谁？

translation.en: Oh, she had this terrible medieval themed Bat Mitzvah called Kate Kossman Knights,
translation.zh: 她办了个很烂的中世纪主题成年礼 称为“凯特科斯曼骑士”

translation.en: not realizing the initials spelled out KKK.
translation.zh: 没意识到缩写和“三K党”一样

translation.en: Yeah, no, I could see that being a problem. Okay.
translation.zh: 是啊 这确实是个问题 对

translation.en: So now, she just sits alone in the cafeteria sewing friendship bracelets
translation.zh: 所以现在 她只能独自坐在餐厅里编制友谊手链

translation.en: for literally no one because she has no friends.
translation.zh: 但没送手链的对象 因为她根本没朋友

translation.en: That sounds a little dramatic.
translation.zh: 听起来有点夸张

translation.en: Oh, so you think you shouldn't be punished for promoting the KKK.
translation.zh: 所以你认为 哪怕宣传“三K党” 你也不该受到惩罚

translation.en: Wow, Mom, didn't realize you supported racism.
translation.zh: 哇 妈妈 我没意识到你居然支持种族歧视

translation.en: Oh boy.
translation.zh: 天啊

translation.en: [Stacy] Hear me out.
translation.zh: 听我说

translation.en: You're always saying how my Bat Mitzvah determines the rest of my life.
translation.zh: 你们总是说 我的成年礼决定了我余下的人生

translation.en: And I think Dua Lipa would make my life perfect.
translation.zh: 我认为杜阿利帕能够让我的人生完美

translation.en: No. No famous pop stars, no yachts, no sailboats even.
translation.zh: 不行 不能请流行明星 没有游艇 连帆船都没戏

translation.en: That's so unfair! Ronnie got a baked potato bar at hers!
translation.zh: 太不公平了！ 萝妮的派对上还有烤土豆台呢！

translation.en: Listen, when I got Bar Mitzvahed, we had a party in Grandma's basement.
translation.zh: 听着 我办成年礼时 就是在奶奶家的地下室办了派对

translation.en: We all split, like, this giant matzo ball.
translation.zh: 我们所有人分享了一个巨大的丸子

translation.en: That was the fun.
translation.zh: 很有意思的

translation.en: You know what the theme was? Being Jewish.
translation.zh: 你知道我的主题是什么吗？做犹太人

translation.en: Just practice your prayers and write your speech already.
translation.zh: 你快点练习祷告 写好自己的演讲稿

translation.en: Oh, I've been doing that Mr. Friedman. It's all covered.
translation.zh: 费曼先生 我一直在写 已经搞定了

translation.en: You're writing Stacy's speech?
translation.zh: 你在写斯泰西的演讲稿？

translation.en: -You know I'm not good at writing. -English is her worst subject.
translation.zh: 你知道我不擅长写作 英文是她最差的科目 她真的很烂

translation.en: It's really bad.
translation.zh: 英文是她最差的科目 她真的很烂

translation.en: -Stacy, that is so not okay. -[Lydia] It's fine.
translation.zh: -斯泰西 这可不行 -没关系

translation.en: She's gonna do my entrance video. I know she'll crush it. Don't worry.
translation.zh: 她会制作我的登场影片 她肯定会拍得超赞 别担心

translation.en: Can I at least have a virgin mojito bar?
translation.zh: 能至少给我安排 一个无酒精莫吉托吧台吗？

translation.en: You can have a ball pit.
translation.zh: 可以给你安排个海洋球池

translation.en: Oh my God, Dad. That's for kids! I've had my period for seven months now!
translation.zh: 我的天 爸爸 那是给小孩子玩的！ 我已经来了七个月的月经了！

translation.en: [chuckling] Wait, Stacy.
translation.zh: 等等 斯泰西

translation.en: That's a long period, sweetheart!
translation.zh: 那还真是很长时间呢 亲爱的！

translation.en: You know what? I'm gonna head out.
translation.zh: 那好 这样吧 我先走了

translation.en: I'll drive you.
translation.zh: 我开车送你

translation.en: [Lydia] Love you. See you in the morning.
translation.zh: 我爱你们 早上见

translation.en: Don't worry, Dad. It'll be okay.
translation.zh: 别担心 爸爸 会没事的

translation.en: She's growing up so fast. It's crazy.
translation.zh: 她成长得太快了 太疯狂了

translation.en: [Ronnie] I'm drinking now.
translation.zh: 我喝酒了

translation.en: I tried it the other day. I didn't like it. We're good.
translation.zh: 我前几天试过一次 并不喜欢 所以没事的

translation.en: [Stacy, narrating] Dear God, what's up?
translation.zh: 亲爱的上帝 你好吗？

translation.en: Stacy Friedman here, but I guess you already know that.
translation.zh: 我是斯泰西费曼 不过我猜你已经知道了

translation.en: And I guess you already know what I'm going to say.
translation.zh: 我猜你也知道我要说什么了

translation.en: But just to be super safe, I'm going to say it anyway.
translation.zh: 但为了超级保险起见 我还是想说出来

translation.en: I would really, really appreciate it if I could have an amazing Bat Mitzvah.
translation.zh: 如果我能拥有一次超棒的成年礼 那我会感激不尽

translation.en: And I know I need to do my mitzvah project.
translation.zh: 我知道我得做自己的成年礼善行

translation.en: But isn't a mitzvah project supposed to be giving back in a way that represents me?
translation.zh: 但成年礼善行应该是以一种 代表我的方式回馈社会 不是吗？

translation.en: Which is why I don't know what to do.
translation.zh: 正因如此 我现在毫无头绪

translation.en: I mean, I'm not popular.
translation.zh: 我算不上受欢迎

translation.en: I'm not a loser.
translation.zh: 但也不是废柴

translation.en: I don't know who I am.
translation.zh: 我不知道自己是谁

translation.en: But I do know, if I have a kick-ass Bat Mitzvah,
translation.zh: 但我知道 如果我能办个了不起的成年礼

translation.en: doors would open, and I can have a fab life on my own terms.
translation.zh: 我会有更多机会 我能按照自己的方式过上精彩人生

translation.en: [woman] No. No famous pop stars.
translation.zh: 不行 不能请流行明星

translation.en: [man] You can have a ball pit.
translation.zh: 可以给你安排个海洋球池

translation.en: [Stacy] A ball pit? Lydia's gonna get everything she asked for.
translation.zh: 海洋球池？ 莉迪亚会得到自己想要的一切

translation.en: Even a Twizzlers station for me.
translation.zh: 甚至会为我设立一个扭扭糖果台

translation.en: I'm starting to worry Mom and Dad don't get it,
translation.zh: 我开始担心爸妈似乎不能理解

translation.en: and the whole thing's gonna suck.
translation.zh: 整件事会变得很糟

translation.en: -[Stacy] You had her phone the whole time? -[Lydia] No, she was lying.
translation.zh: -你一直拿着她的手机？ -不对 她在撒谎

translation.en: -The audacity. -The monster.
translation.zh: -大言不惭 -好可怕

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: -就像爸爸一样 -对

translation.en: -Can we sit outside? It's a nice day. -No.
translation.zh: -我们能坐外面吗？天气不错 -不要

translation.en: I mean, I definitely could use some color.
translation.zh: 我确实需要晒晒肤色

translation.en: -Yeah, it's true. -Is that Tory Burch?
translation.zh: -对 没错 -那是汤丽柏琦吗？

translation.en: Oh no, it's Walmart. I got this and a water bottle for only $12.
translation.zh: 哦 不是的 是沃尔玛 这个加上一个水瓶 只要12美元

translation.en: I was talking to her.
translation.zh: 我在跟她说话

translation.en: M-me?
translation.zh: 我吗？

translation.en: Your skirt.
translation.zh: 你的裙子

translation.en: Uh, yeah, it is Tory Burch.
translation.zh: 没错 是汤丽柏琦

translation.en: My mom is trying to spend all my dad's money before the next court date.
translation.zh: 我妈想在下次开庭前 把我爸的钱都花光

translation.en: I'm pretty sure I saw Hailey Bieber wearing the exact same one.
translation.zh: 我很确定海莉比伯穿过一模一样的

translation.en: [softly] Oh cool. Okay. Bye.
translation.zh: 不错嘛 好 再见

translation.en: That was weird.
translation.zh: 好奇怪啊

translation.en: -I love and hate them at the same time. -[sighing] Yeah.
translation.zh: -我对她们真是又爱又恨 -是啊

translation.en: What just happened?
translation.zh: 刚才是怎么回事？

translation.en: So get this. I heard Megan's doing her mitzvah project next weekend.
translation.zh: 好吧 我听说 梅根下周末要做她的成年礼善行

translation.en: She's passing out sunscreen at Coachella.
translation.zh: 在科切拉音乐节发放防晒霜

translation.en: -What? Wow. -[Stacy] So cool.
translation.zh: -什么？哇 -太酷了

translation.en: Guys, I have to come up with something amazing.
translation.zh: 各位 我得想些超厉害的主意

translation.en: This is so much pressure.
translation.zh: 压力简直太大了

translation.en: How long do you think it takes to become a social activist influencer on TikTok?
translation.zh: 要在抖音上成为社会活动家网红 你觉得要花多长时间？

translation.en: Uh, six months?
translation.zh: 六个月？

translation.en: Too long. [sighing]
translation.zh: 太久了

translation.en: You know what? We just need to chill our brains.
translation.zh: 你猜怎么着？我们得好好放松一下

translation.en: What are you doing Saturday? My mom's out of town this weekend.
translation.zh: 你们这些家伙周六干什么？ 我妈妈这周末去外地

translation.en: Why? You gonna throw a party?
translation.zh: 怎么？你要办派对吗？

translation.en: A dork party?
translation.zh: 呆子派对？

translation.en: What if I did?
translation.zh: 那又怎样？

translation.en: Well, I mean, my dad's out of town.
translation.zh: 我爸爸也在外地

translation.en: Now, you could actually throw a party.
translation.zh: 你确实可以办个派对

translation.en: You could invite the whole seventh grade and not exclude anybody.
translation.zh: 你可以邀请整个七年级的人 且不拒绝任何人

translation.en: Oh, come on. Wouldn't it be fun to exclude people instead of being excluded for once?
translation.zh: 拜托 尝尝拒绝别人的滋味 而不是被拒绝 不是挺有趣吗？

translation.en: [Andy] Heads up!
translation.zh: 小心！

translation.en: [Lydia] Ay dios mío. Stace, Stace, Stace, Stace? Are you okay?
translation.zh: 我的老天啊 小斯？你没事吧？

translation.en: -[kids gasping] -Oh shit.
translation.zh: 该死

translation.en: That doesn't look good.
translation.zh: 看起来不太妙

translation.en: You have grass in your hair.
translation.zh: 你的头发沾上了草

translation.en: [Mateo] Stacy.
translation.zh: 斯泰西

translation.en: Are you okay?
translation.zh: 你没事吧？

translation.en: [Andy] That's my bad!
translation.zh: 是我的错！

translation.en: You good?
translation.zh: 你没事吧？

translation.en: Yeah. Sorry about that.
translation.zh: 是啊 抱歉

translation.en: -Have some water. -[music stops]
translation.zh: 喝点水吧

translation.en: Oh my God. That was perfect.
translation.zh: 我的天啊 太完美了

translation.en: He went… And then you went.
translation.zh: 他刚这样 然后你也这样

translation.en: -You guys are meant to be. -[Stacy chuckling]
translation.zh: 你们注定是一对

translation.en: Hey, are your legs okay, Nikki?
translation.zh: 嘿 你的腿没事吧 妮基？

translation.en: They're fine, Mateo. Just relax.
translation.zh: 没事 马提奥 别激动

translation.en: [Lydia] Really?
translation.zh: 真的吗？

translation.en: Oh, by the way, Dad invited the dry cleaner to the Bat Mitzvah, Stacy.
translation.zh: 顺便告诉你 斯泰西 爸爸邀请了干洗店的人参加成年礼

translation.en: What? No, that's so unfair.
translation.zh: 什么？不行 这太不公平了

translation.en: The ratio to old people to normal people is already so unbalanced.
translation.zh: 老年人和正常人的比例已经很失衡了

translation.en: Why is that kid Mateo going to Hebrew school?
translation.zh: 那个叫马提奥的小孩 为什么要上希伯来学校？

translation.en: Maybe he wanted to convert and take some Jewish holidays off?
translation.zh: 也许他想皈依 休几个犹太节假日？

translation.en: [Lydia] You gonna invite him, Stace?
translation.zh: 你会邀请他吗 小斯？

translation.en: Mateo? No, I barely know him.
translation.zh: 马提奥？才不会 我跟他不熟

translation.en: You know, if you invite Mateo, Andy might come.
translation.zh: 如果你邀请了马提奥 安迪可能会来

translation.en: Have fun learning!
translation.zh: 祝你学得开心！

translation.en: Love you!
translation.zh: 爱你！

translation.en: Oh shit!
translation.zh: 噢 我靠！

translation.en: Are you on dru--
translation.zh: 你是不是嗑…

translation.en: -[boy] Thank you. -[Lydia] Good job, guys.
translation.zh: -谢谢 -做得好 各位

translation.en: -Manishmah. -Hi.
translation.zh: -你好啊 -嗨

translation.en: -Shalom, you two. -Shalom.
translation.zh: -祝你们两个平安 -平安

translation.en: [Lydia] Oh, this looks really good. I am not that creative…
translation.zh: 看起来真的很不错 -我没那么有创意 -我不擅长做手工艺之类的

translation.en: I was not good at arts and crafts, like, at all.
translation.zh: -我没那么有创意 -我不擅长做手工艺之类的

translation.en: -I like your outfit, Ashley. -Thank you.
translation.zh: -我喜欢你的衣服 阿什利 -谢谢

translation.en: Oh yeah, it's really cute.
translation.zh: 是啊 真的很可爱

translation.en: [girl] Look who's coming out of the make out closet.
translation.zh: 瞧瞧谁刚刚亲热完出来了

translation.en: [Stacy] Oh my God, were they hooking up in there?
translation.zh: 天啊 他们刚刚在里面亲热吗？

translation.en: How do they not get caught? There's literally so many people around.
translation.zh: 他们怎么没被逮住？这里人这么多

translation.en: Would you believe when I was your age, I was in a Jewish rock and roll band?
translation.zh: 你们相信吗？我像你们这么大时 曾经在一个犹太摇滚乐队里

translation.en: We called ourselves Exodus because Genesis was already taken.
translation.zh: 我们自称“出埃及记” 因为“创世记”的名字已经有人用了

translation.en: I'm sorry, Aaron, am I boring you?
translation.zh: 抱歉 艾伦 你觉得无聊吗？

translation.en: [Aaron] What? No-- I was listening, Cantor Jerry.
translation.zh: 什么？没有啊 我在听呢 杰瑞领唱

translation.en: [Nikki] Stace, Lyd!
translation.zh: 小斯 嘿！

translation.en: -You look so cute. You guys good? -[Nikki] Yes.
translation.zh: -你看起来好可爱 你们好吗？ -是的

translation.en: -The pole! -Pole!
translation.zh: -柱子！ -柱子！

translation.en: Oh, wait, how's your Torah portion going?
translation.zh: 对了 你的《妥拉》选段练得如何？

translation.en: It's like 6,000 pages long.
translation.zh: 简直有六千页那么长

translation.en: Why did my parents pick the third week of August?
translation.zh: 我爸妈为什么要选八月的第三周？

translation.en: But mine's literally, like, a minute and a half long. Thank you, June 10th!
translation.zh: 我的选段只有一分半钟 感谢你 6月10日！

translation.en: Chop-chop, ladies! Curtain's up in five!
translation.zh: 女士们 快点 还有五分钟就开幕了！

translation.en: I like to think of Hebrew school as a little performance I give.
translation.zh: 我喜欢把希伯来学校 当成我的表演舞台

translation.en: Your prayer book is the playbill, and I'm the star, cutie-pops.
translation.zh: 你们的祈祷书是节目单 而我是主角 小可爱们

translation.en: Giving you a bit of the ole razzle-dazzle. You know what I'm saying?
translation.zh: 给你们呈现一些眼花缭乱的节目 懂我的意思吗？

translation.en: Kidding. Come one, class is starting. Let's go!
translation.zh: 开玩笑啦 来吧 要上课了 走吧！

translation.en: [girl 2] Rabbi Rebecca!
translation.zh: -瑞贝卡拉比！ -我们可以吃些点心吗？

translation.en: -Can we please have snacks? -You want some latkes and gefilte fish?
translation.zh: -瑞贝卡拉比！ -我们可以吃些点心吗？ 你们想吃薯饼和鱼糕？

translation.en: She's insane.
translation.zh: 她太疯狂了

translation.en: I know. I love her. [giggling]
translation.zh: 是啊 我好爱她

translation.en: "And I'm the star, cutie-pops, razzle-dazzle."
translation.zh: 我是主角 小可爱们 眼花缭乱

translation.en: -Very nice. -Very good.
translation.zh: -很不错 -很好

translation.en: Thank you. Thank you very much.
translation.zh: 谢谢 非常感谢

translation.en: -Is she serious? Oh my God. -I know, right?
translation.zh: -她是认真的吗？我的天 -是啊 对吧？

translation.en: I really want a cloud. Like, I want to taste a cloud.
translation.zh: 我好想要一朵云 我想尝尝云朵

translation.en: -You want what? -I want to taste a cloud.
translation.zh: -你想什么？ -我想尝尝云朵

translation.en: I want to taste a cloud. That's all.
translation.zh: 只是一朵云而已

translation.en: -[Lydia] It seems-- -[Andy] Yo. You good, bro?
translation.zh: -真的挺… -哥们 你还好吗？

translation.en: Yeah. Why?
translation.zh: 是啊 为什么？

translation.en: Uh, your head from earlier.
translation.zh: 之前踢到你的脑袋

translation.en: Head injuries are no joke.
translation.zh: 头部受伤可不是小事

translation.en: One time I barfed at soccer from a concussion.
translation.zh: 有一次我踢球时吐了 因为脑震荡

translation.en: Did you barf?
translation.zh: 你吐了吗？

translation.en: No. I didn't.
translation.zh: 没有 我没吐

translation.en: Tight.
translation.zh: 那就好

translation.en: -All right, shabbat shalom! -[class] Shabbat shalom.
translation.zh: 好了 大家平安！

translation.en: [Rebecca] How's everyone feeling? We having the time of our lives right now?
translation.zh: 好嘞 大家感觉如何？ 现在是不是超级开心？

translation.en: You guys start your mitzvah projects yet?
translation.zh: 你们开始准备 自己的成年礼善行了吗？

translation.en: -[class] No. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -没有 -是的

translation.en: No? It's the most important part of this whole thing.
translation.zh: 没有吗？ 这可是整个过程中最重要的部分

translation.en: It's when you do something menschie for your community, for society at-large.
translation.zh: 你要为自己的社区、为整个社会 做一些高洁、公正的事情

translation.en: What? You guys don't care about society at-large?
translation.zh: 怎么？你们不关心整个社会吗？

translation.en: -[class] No. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -不关心 -关心

translation.en: All right, how about we pick up where we left off with our old buddy, David.
translation.zh: 好吧 我们继续聊聊 上回说到的老朋友大卫王

translation.en: Remember him? Homeboy was about to get his groove on with the foxy Bathsheba
translation.zh: 还记得他吗？那位老乡 正打算和诱人的拔示巴享受鱼水之欢

translation.en: even though she was married to someone else.
translation.zh: 虽然她已经和别人结婚了

translation.en: [scoffing] What a snake David is! You a snake, Aaron?
translation.zh: 大卫可真狡诈啊！你狡诈吗 艾伦？

translation.en: N-no.
translation.zh: 不狡诈

translation.en: You ever pull something like that? Cheat on your wife?
translation.zh: 你做过这种事情吗 艾伦？ 背着老婆偷情？

translation.en: -M-me? -Dude, I'm messing around with you. Relax!
translation.zh: -我？ -哥们 我逗你玩呢 放松啦！

translation.en: You're sweating, my goodness.
translation.zh: 你都出汗了 天啊

translation.en: You're not a snake, Aaron. You're awesome.
translation.zh: 你不狡诈 艾伦 你很棒的

translation.en: Look at that arm hair and mustache coming in strong.
translation.zh: 瞧瞧你手臂的毛发和胡子都长出来了

translation.en: Baruch HaShem, Aaron. Let's go.
translation.zh: 太好了 艾伦 加油

translation.en: [Gabi] So I told the sales lady, "I'll take one in each color."
translation.zh: 于是我跟销售小姐说： “每种颜色都要一个”

translation.en: And she said, "Are you getting a divorce?" And I said, "How'd you guess?"
translation.zh: 她说：“你在办离婚吗？” 我说：“你怎么知道的？”

translation.en: That's really funny, Mom.
translation.zh: 真好笑 妈妈

translation.en: Hey, can you let me bring over some people on Saturday?
translation.zh: 嘿 周六能不能让我带朋友来家里？

translation.en: Oh sure. Like a playdate?
translation.zh: 当然可以 玩伴约会？

translation.en: A playdate? Mom, I'm 13. Please don't call it a playdate.
translation.zh: 玩伴约会？妈 我都13岁了 别再用这种幼稚词汇了

translation.en: My dad's calling me. Hi!
translation.zh: 我爸在给我打电话 嗨！

translation.en: Hey! Stacels. Hey, I'm at the store right now. Mommy told me you need some, uh, tampons…
translation.zh: 嘿 小泰西 我现在在店里 妈妈告诉我 你需要卫生棉条

translation.en: -But I'm not sure what size you use-- -Stop. Get whatever.
translation.zh: -但我不确定你用什么尺寸… -别说了 随便拿

translation.en: [Danny] There's a lot of whatever to choose from. Do pads. I don't care.
translation.zh: -这里的选择太多了 -那就拿卫生巾 我无所谓

translation.en: What kind of flow do you got going?
translation.zh: 你到底是什么流量？

translation.en: -Uh, heavy flow situation? -Heavy.
translation.zh: -量大？ -量大

translation.en: -Oh my God. -A light flow? Or extra chunky?
translation.zh: -我的天 -量小？还是有血块？

translation.en: I… I… I got confused. I'm getting peanut butter also.
translation.zh: 我很迷惑 我也会买点花生酱

translation.en: -[Stacy] I mean-- -Mommy said it was a high-alert situation?
translation.zh: -我是说… -妈妈说你是高度戒备状态？

translation.en: That you might have to sleep in the bathtub?
translation.zh: 说你可能要睡在浴缸里？

translation.en: I'll drop 'em off in your room immediately.
translation.zh: 我马上送到你的房间里

translation.en: Oh my God. Love you. Bye.
translation.zh: 我的天 爱你 再见

translation.en: "Hey, Lyd, it's Kym. Having people over now."
translation.zh: 嘿 小莉 我是金 正在招待朋友

translation.en: "Pull up if you're free."
translation.zh: 有空就过来

translation.en: Wow.
translation.zh: 哇

translation.en: Um, what do I say?
translation.zh: 我该说什么？

translation.en: Do you want to go?
translation.zh: 你想去吗？

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 不想

translation.en: But, I mean, I should respond.
translation.zh: 但我觉得我应该回复

translation.en: Yeah. For sure. Uh, if you want to go, I don't care.
translation.zh: 对 当然了 如果你想去 我也无所谓

translation.en: I just think they're awful, but it's your choice.
translation.zh: 我只是觉得她们很差劲 但这件事由你决定

translation.en: -Let me ask if you can come. -No. Please don't do that.
translation.zh: -我问问你能不能一起去 -不要 拜托别这样

translation.en: Yeah, I'm gonna ask. Doing it right now. Look, I just did it. Whoops. Sorry.
translation.zh: 我会问的 我现在就问 你看 我已经问了 哎呀 抱歉

translation.en: Oh my God! Okay, Mom, can you drop us off at Kym Chang-Cohen's house, please?
translation.zh: 天呐 好吧 妈妈 能拜托你送我们去金蝉柯亨家吗？

translation.en: -Wait. Can you stop by my place first? -[Gabi] Sure.
translation.zh: -等等 能先去我家一趟吗？ -当然

translation.en: -[mouthing] Period. -You gonna ask if Tara and Nikki can come?
translation.zh: -月经 -你不问问塔拉和妮基能不能去吗？

translation.en: [Lydia] Oh.
translation.zh: 哦

translation.en: Oh. Um, I mean, I don't think so.
translation.zh: 我觉得还是别问了吧

translation.en: Bringing three people would be, like, a lot.
translation.zh: 带三个人就有点太多了

translation.en: -Yeah, I agree. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -对 我同意 -对

translation.en: Okay. Hurry.
translation.zh: 好 快点

translation.en: -Hi, Ron. -[Ronnie] Hi.
translation.zh: -嗨 小萝 -嗨

translation.en: -Should I wear a jacket with this? -No. Where are you going?
translation.zh: -我应该配一件外套吗？ -不要 你要去哪里？

translation.en: Kym Chang-Cohen's.
translation.zh: 金蝉柯亨家

translation.en: Oh wow. First rule of going to a cool kid's house, don't disagree.
translation.zh: 哇 去酷孩子家的首要规则 不要意见不合

translation.en: Don't get too excited.
translation.zh: 别表现得太激动

translation.en: -Got it. Thanks. -Cool.
translation.zh: -知道了 谢谢 -好的

translation.en: [Ronnie] Oh, Dad left pads on your bed.

translation.en: They're enormous. I almost thought they were pillows.
translation.zh: 超大尺寸的 我差点以为是枕头

translation.en: Are you joking?
translation.zh: 你在开玩笑吗？

translation.en: [Lydia laughing] That's funny.
translation.zh: 真好笑

translation.en: [Lydia squealing] Oh my God.
translation.zh: 我的天

translation.en: [Stacy] Remember. Don't disagree. Don't get too excited.
translation.zh: 记住 不要意见不合 别太激动

translation.en: So, Lydia, any crushes?

translation.en: No, not really. There's not a lot of options for boys in our grade.
translation.zh: 没有 我们这个年级的男生选择不多

translation.en: -You know? -[both chuckling awkwardly]
translation.zh: 你知道吗？

translation.en: Oh, so you only like boys?
translation.zh: 你只喜欢男生吗？

translation.en: Uh, I think so. Don't worry. Some of us are straight too.
translation.zh: -我想是的 -别担心 我们有些人也是直的

translation.en: Cool.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: I don't disagree.
translation.zh: 我完全同意

translation.en: Yeah, Stacy, what about you?

translation.en: Who do you like?

translation.en: Uh, no one, really.

translation.en: Uh, people are coming to my house tomorrow if you want to come. Nothing big.

translation.en: Sounds chill.

translation.en: You guys have to come. It'll be freaking amazing! Her house is so cool.

translation.en: I mean, it'll be a'ight.

translation.en: [clearing throat] Uh, anyways, we should probably wash this off before we go.

translation.en: -Uh, we have to change before we leave. -Where are we going?

translation.en: To the ledge.
translation.zh: 去岩脊

translation.en: -No way. -We'll be careful.
translation.zh: -不行 -我们会小心行事

translation.en: I don't want to die.
translation.zh: 我可不想死

translation.en: -We have to. We can't disagree. -What?

translation.en: Don't act excited!

translation.en: [Kym] Andy will be there.

translation.en: Come on, Lydia, can't you do this for me?

translation.en: I already got you invited here. Isn't that enough?

translation.en: I didn't mean it like that.
translation.zh: 我不是那个意思

translation.en: You guys coming or what?

translation.en: Yeah, I'm down.

translation.en: Ugh, my mom said I have to wait a year before I can get lip filler.

translation.en: She said you can have Botox. Just use that on your lips.
translation.zh: 她说你可以打肉毒杆菌 打在嘴唇上就行了

translation.en: [girl] Yeah.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: Look who's here!
translation.zh: 看看谁来了！

translation.en: [Andy] What up, what up?
translation.zh: 你们好吗？

translation.en: What's good?

translation.en: Hi, Stacy. Hey, Mateo.

translation.en: Yo, we just had soccer, and we kicked St. Catherine's ass, 3-0.
translation.zh: 我们刚踢完足球 圣凯瑟琳零比三惨败

translation.en: Even though their field sucks.

translation.en: Yeah, that field is so lopsided.
translation.zh: 没错 那个球场特别高低不平

translation.en: Exactly.
translation.zh: 没错

translation.en: how's your head?
translation.zh: 你的脑袋怎么样了？

translation.en: It's, um… it's still on her body, so…
translation.zh: 还安然待在她身上 所以…

translation.en: Yeah, we love that.
translation.zh: 是啊 那就好

translation.en: And I'm not barfing, so, yeah.
translation.zh: 我也没吐 所以挺好

translation.en: Uh, anyways…
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: What's up? I'm Andy.
translation.zh: 你好吗？我是安迪

translation.en: Uh, I know. We, uh… we go to Hebrew school together. Lydia.
translation.zh: 我知道 我们上同一所希伯来学校 我是莉迪亚

translation.en: We do?
translation.zh: 是吗？

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 是啊

translation.en: [Aaron] I dare one of you guys to jump in! Come on! Let's go.
translation.zh: 我挑战你们跳下去 来吧 我们走！

translation.en: [Mateo] Jump off the ledge, Aaron?

translation.en: You'd break both legs on impact and your spine.

translation.en: Yeah, I heard Melissa Quinto's cousin jumped,
translation.zh: 是啊 我听说梅丽莎昆泰的表姐跳过

translation.en: and she now has to text with her nose, so, no.
translation.zh: 现在她只能用鼻子发短信 所以我不要

translation.en: Looks like it might be fun.
translation.zh: 看起来也许很有趣

translation.en: Hey, I'd jump if I didn't have my contacts in.
translation.zh: 喂 要是我没戴隐形眼镜 我肯定跳

translation.en: Oh, I'd be happy to hold them for you, Aaron.
translation.zh: 噢 我很愿意帮你拿着 艾伦

translation.en: Oh shit. You can't see.
translation.zh: 该死 那你就看不见了

translation.en: I'll do it.
translation.zh: 我来吧

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: [Andy] You'd jump in? That… that's sick.
translation.zh: 你会跳吗？太酷了

translation.en: Let's see it.
translation.zh: 我们来瞧瞧

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: -No way, no way. -Oh shit.
translation.zh: -不可能 -我靠

translation.en: [Aaron] If she jumps, it's my idea, guys.
translation.zh: 如果她跳了 那可是我的主意 各位

translation.en: [boy] We don't know if that's shallow.
translation.zh: -不会吧 -敬人生

translation.en: -She's not gonna do it. -She's not gonna do it.
translation.zh: -她不会跳的 -她不会跳的

translation.en: -If she dies, we weren't here. -Hell no.
translation.zh: -如果她死了 我们就咬定不在场 -绝对的

translation.en: -[girl] She's a scaredy-cat. -[boy] She's stalling.
translation.zh: -她是个胆小鬼 -她在故意拖延时间

translation.en: Stacy, you said we'd be careful. Please.
translation.zh: 斯泰西 你自己说过会小心的 拜托

translation.en: Is Andy watching?
translation.zh: 安迪在看吗？

translation.en: Everyone is watching!
translation.zh: 大家都在看！

translation.en: Friedman! Yo, you got this! Let's go!
translation.zh: 费曼 你可以的 加油！

translation.en: -[Andy] Let's get it! -Stacy, do not do this to me.
translation.zh: -来吧！ -斯泰西 别做这种事

translation.en: If you die, your parents will kill me. I swear to God. Stacy! No!
translation.zh: 如果你死了 你父母会杀了我 我对上帝发誓 斯泰西 不要啊！

translation.en: -Oh my God! -Holy shit!
translation.zh: -我的天！ -天啊！

translation.en: -My God! -Oh my God!
translation.zh: -天啊！ -我的天！

translation.en: [Lydia] Stacy!
translation.zh: 斯泰西！

translation.en: -Stacy! -Oh shit!
translation.zh: -斯泰西！ -我靠！

translation.en: [girl] That was unreal!
translation.zh: 简直太扯了！

translation.en: -[boy] Stacy! -Woohoo!
translation.zh: 斯泰西！

translation.en: -That was my idea! -Yo, shut up!
translation.zh: -那可是我的主意！ -喂 闭嘴！

translation.en: Yo, Stacy Friedman!
translation.zh: 哟 斯泰西费曼！

translation.en: You're a fricken' legend!
translation.zh: 你真是个传奇人物！

translation.en: That's how I do it!
translation.zh: 这就是我的风格！

translation.en: What is that?
translation.zh: 那是什么？

translation.en: [Andy] Oh, disgusting.
translation.zh: 真恶心

translation.en: Yo, Stacy just turned the ledge into the Red Sea.
translation.zh: 哟 斯泰西刚刚把岩脊变成了红海

translation.en: [Anya] Chill out.
translation.zh: 别激动

translation.en: It's just a period, guys. It happens every month.
translation.zh: 只是月经而已 各位 每个月都会来的

translation.en: That looks like two months.
translation.zh: 看着像两个月的量

translation.en: You couldn't deal with having a period, Aaron.
translation.zh: 你肯定无法忍受月经 艾伦

translation.en: Yeah, you punk.
translation.zh: 是啊 你这个混蛋

translation.en: Wait, what'd I even do?
translation.zh: 等等 我到底做了什么？

translation.en: Thanks for laughing with everyone.
translation.zh: 谢谢你和大家一起嘲笑我

translation.en: I wasn't laughing.
translation.zh: 我没笑

translation.en: Yes, you were.
translation.zh: 你笑了

translation.en: Stacy, it's not that big of a deal. Just take my sweatshirt.
translation.zh: 斯泰西 没什么大不了的 穿上我的汗衫吧

translation.en: Not a big deal? That was humiliating! Andy looked at me like--
translation.zh: 没什么大不了的？简直太丢脸了！ 安迪看我的表情简直…

translation.en: You're a badass! That's all anyone was thinking.
translation.zh: 你太厉害了 大家都是这么想的

translation.en: No, whatever. I'm over him.
translation.zh: 算了 无所谓 我不喜欢他了

translation.en: Call it.
translation.zh: 宣布吧

translation.en: -Stacy, think this through. -I did. Call it.
translation.zh: -斯泰西 你再好好想想 -我想过了 宣布吧
5点23分

translation.en: Stacy Friedman's crush on Andy Goldfarb has ended.
translation.zh: 斯泰西费曼 对安迪戈法布的暗恋正式结束

translation.en: Time of death, 5:23 p.m.
translation.zh: 死亡时间 下午5点23分

translation.en: Okay, let's just go.
translation.zh: 好了 我们走吧

translation.en: No, you just stay with your new friends.
translation.zh: 别 你和你的新朋友待在一起吧

translation.en: What? What are you talking about?
translation.zh: 什么？你说什么呢？

translation.en: Oh my God, stop! You didn't have my back. Just admit it!
translation.zh: 天呐 别装了 你根本没支持我 承认吧！

translation.en: You stop. I told you not to jump. I didn't even want to be here.
translation.zh: 你别说了 我叫你不要跳 我本来就不想来这里的

translation.en: Only because you already got them to come to your party!
translation.zh: 那是因为 你已经邀请他们去参加你的派对了

translation.en: -You're being so dramatic right now! -You're such a wannabe right now!
translation.zh: -你也太夸张了吧！ -你也太追捧他们了吧！

translation.en: I'm freezing. I'm gonna go.
translation.zh: 我要冻死了 我走了

translation.en: Wow, Stacy. I can't even.
translation.zh: 哇 斯泰西 我真受不了你

translation.en: I can't even, even more.
translation.zh: 我更受不了你

translation.en: [Danny] What you gonna do, sweets?
translation.zh: 你打算干什么 亲爱的？

translation.en: [Bree] Sending out the invitations today.
translation.zh: 今天要发邀请函

translation.en: I have to get my hair dyed-- Oh, will you call DJ Schmuley?
translation.zh: 我得把头发染好 对了 你能打给史姆利唱片骑师吗？

translation.en: He's asking for a green room and per diem.
translation.zh: 他要一个休息室和日津贴

translation.en: And he may or may not have hit on me.
translation.zh: 他可能还跟我调情来着 也可能没有

translation.en: Well, I may or may not punch him in the face.
translation.zh: 我可能会揍他的脸 也可能不会

translation.en: -Yeah, okay. [chuckling] -Let me handle Schmuley.
translation.zh: -好吧 -史姆利交给我处理

translation.en: So, you, I'm going to the movies. You want to come?
translation.zh: 那你呢 我要去看电影 你来吗？

translation.en: Too weird being at a movie theater alone with my dad.
translation.zh: 跟我爸一个人去电影院太奇怪了

translation.en: Okay, you never want to be with me again? What are you gonna do all day?

translation.en: Whoa. What a deep cut.
translation.zh: 哇 太伤人了

translation.en: Get out of here with that shit! Let Schmuley handle the vibe around here!
translation.zh: 少给我来这一套！ 让史姆利来掌控这里的气氛！

translation.en: Make some noise, party people!
translation.zh: 派对的朋友们一起欢呼！

translation.en: -[woman] Oh. Yeah. -It's too loud in here.
translation.zh: -哦 对 -这里太吵了

translation.en: You know, we didn't have to suffer with these Bat Mitzvahs when we were your age.
translation.zh: 我们在你这个年纪时 可不用忍受这些成年礼活动

translation.en: We just celebrated with our families, and poof, you're a woman.
translation.zh: 我们只会和家人庆祝 然后瞬间 你就成为女人了

translation.en: -Yeah. -Girls didn't have Bat Mitzvahs?
translation.zh: -是啊 -女孩没有成年礼吗？

translation.en: My mother told me girls were born into God's kingdom, so we didn't have to.
translation.zh: 我母亲告诉我 女孩生在上帝的国度 所以不必举办成年礼

translation.en: She was full of it. She was just trying to save money.
translation.zh: 她满嘴胡话 她只是想省省钱

translation.en: Go. Just go.
translation.zh: 去吧 快去

translation.en: Man, that's all-time. You ever seen Evil Dead 2?
translation.zh: 天啊 这可是经典 你们看过《鬼玩人2》吗？

translation.en: -Yeah, we saw it. It was weak. -Yeah, just like you two.
translation.zh: -对 我们看过 太弱了 -没错 就像你们俩一样

translation.en: Ugh. Could you just let us watch our movie?
translation.zh: 能不能让我们踏实看电影？

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: [Danny] What's going on?
translation.zh: 你怎么了？

translation.en: Why are you hanging out with us old people right now?
translation.zh: 为什么和我们这些老家伙混？ 怎么不去找朋友玩？

translation.en: -Why are you not with your friends? -I have a stomach ache.
translation.zh: 为什么和我们这些老家伙混？ 怎么不去找朋友玩？ 我肚子痛

translation.en: You have a stomach ache? All right. I'll get you a ginger ale.
translation.zh: 你肚子疼？ 好吧 我去给你买姜汁汽水

translation.en: You're not hot. You feel fine.
translation.zh: 你没发烧 感觉没事

translation.en: You don't have a stomach ache.
translation.zh: 你才没有肚子痛

translation.en: How come you're not hanging out with Lydia tonight?
translation.zh: 你怎么今晚没和莉迪亚一起玩？

translation.en: She betrayed me.
translation.zh: 她背叛了我

translation.en: She kissed my crush, and then he touched her underboob in PE.
translation.zh: 她和我暗恋的人接吻 然后体育课上让他碰了她的下乳

translation.en: -Oh. -Oy, underboob. Oh, I got plenty of that.
translation.zh: -哦 -下乳 我可有不少

translation.en: Underboob, overboob, sideboob, behindboob, I got all of it.
translation.zh: 下乳、上乳、侧乳、后乳 我全都有

translation.en: Oh.
translation.zh: 哦

translation.en: You know, bubelah, when I was young,
translation.zh: 你知道么 宝贝 我年轻时

translation.en: my best friend Susie Rebenstock and I fought over a boy,
translation.zh: 我的挚友苏西芮本斯 和我为了一个男生争吵

translation.en: and I stopped talking to her.
translation.zh: 然后我不再和她说话了

translation.en: Fifty years later, I ran into her brother at Zabar's.
translation.zh: 五十年后 我在扎巴尔美食店遇见了她哥哥

translation.en: Turns out, she threw herself off a roof at 32.
translation.zh: 才得知她在32岁时从楼顶上跳了下来

translation.en: I let a stupid boy come between us,
translation.zh: 我让一个愚蠢的男孩拆散了我们

translation.en: and now she's lying dead at the bottom of the Chrysler Building.
translation.zh: 现在她躺在克莱斯勒大厦底下死了

translation.en: Oh my God.
translation.zh: 我的天啊

translation.en: -It was McDonald's. -Whatever! You get my point.
translation.zh: -是麦当劳 -随便啦 你懂我的意思

translation.en: All I'm saying is we girls have to stick together!
translation.zh: 我只想说 我们女孩绝对要团结！

translation.en: -Yeah. -Hear, hear.
translation.zh: -对 -同意

translation.en: Megan!
translation.zh: 梅根！

translation.en: Okay. Here, Tatala, huh?
translation.zh: 好了 给你 小宝贝

translation.en: -Thank you. -Okay.
translation.zh: -谢谢 -好

translation.en: -Hiya, ladies. -Hello.
translation.zh: -嗨 女士们 -你好

translation.en: -[Danny] Hey, hey. -And gentleman.
translation.zh: -嗨 -还有这位男士

translation.en: Mind if I take your extra rolls?
translation.zh: 介意我拿走你们剩下的吗？

translation.en: I'm making up a plate for Andy Goldfarb's grandmother.
translation.zh: 我在给安迪戈法布的奶奶凑一盘

translation.en: Oh, that's nice.
translation.zh: 太贴心了

translation.en: -What a respectful boy you are. -That's sweet.
translation.zh: -你真是个有礼貌的孩子 -真贴心

translation.en: -Here's some basketball rolls. -Gracias.
translation.zh: -这里有些篮球卷饼 -谢谢

translation.en: Wait, why are you making a plate for Andy's grandma?
translation.zh: 等等 你为什么要给安迪的奶奶凑一盘？

translation.en: She only gets Jell-O at her retirement home.
translation.zh: 她在养老院只有果冻吃

translation.en: I thought that I'd get real food for Andy to bring to her when he visits tomorrow.
translation.zh: 我想给安迪搞一盘美食 这样他明天看望她时就能带去

translation.en: Wait, Andy's grandma's in a retirement home?
translation.zh: 等等 安迪的奶奶在养老院？

translation.en: That's awesome.
translation.zh: 太棒了

translation.en: Wait, why is that awesome?
translation.zh: 等等 这有什么棒的？

translation.en: Ooh! The bookies are here!
translation.zh: 图书来了！

translation.en: Andy? Oh, hey!
translation.zh: 安迪？嘿！

translation.en: Yo.
translation.zh: 哟

translation.en: What are you doing here?
translation.zh: 你怎么会在这里？

translation.en: I'm just visiting my grandma.
translation.zh: 我只是来看我奶奶

translation.en: She's taking a nap right now, so I got to sit here till I get picked up.
translation.zh: 她正在小睡 所以我只能坐在这里等人接我

translation.en: It's so sweet that you visit her.
translation.zh: 你能来看她 真是贴心

translation.en: Yeah, my moms say they'll take away my Xbox if I don't. So…
translation.zh: 是啊 我妈说如果我不来 他们就没收我的游戏机 所以…

translation.en: So…
translation.zh: 那么

translation.en: Are you excited about your Bar Mitzvah?
translation.zh: 你期待自己的成年礼吗？

translation.en: Yeah, it should be all right.
translation.zh: 嗯 应该挺不错的

translation.en: That's dope.
translation.zh: 太棒了

translation.en: Yeah, but Lydia, she's being all salty
translation.zh: 是啊 但莉迪亚很不爽

translation.en: 'cause she has to miss some dumb dance competition to go.
translation.zh: 因为她会错过什么破舞蹈竞赛

translation.en: Ugh. I hate how competitive she is.
translation.zh: 我讨厌她这么爱竞争

translation.en: It's just like, why can't it be about the dancing?
translation.zh: 就是说 为什么不能好好跳舞呢？

translation.en: Well, I mean, I play soccer, and soccer is pretty competitive.
translation.zh: 我踢足球 足球也挺有竞争性的

translation.en: Uh, well, soccer's a sport. Dance is an art.
translation.zh: 足球是一项运动 舞蹈是一门艺术

translation.en: Facts.
translation.zh: 确实如此

translation.en: Real talk.
translation.zh: 没错

translation.en: [cell phone vibrating] Andy Goldfarb.
translation.zh: 安迪戈法布

translation.en: Um, yeah. Uber's here. Gotta bounce. Okay. So nice running into you.
translation.zh: -好 优步来了 我得走了 -好 很高兴碰到你

translation.en: Yeah, cool.
translation.zh: 好 酷

translation.en: -Hey. -Yo!
translation.zh: -喂 -哟！

translation.en: -[Andy] Too slow, boy! -Jesus.
translation.zh: -孩子 太慢了！ -天啊

translation.en: [Andy] Can't guard me. Ha ha, old man! Goldfarb rules!
translation.zh: 挑衅我？ 哈哈 老家伙 戈法布最厉害！

translation.en: Still waitin' on me bookies!
translation.zh: 还在等图书呢！

translation.en: It's right here.
translation.zh: 就在这里

translation.en: I don't want that one.
translation.zh: 我不想要那本

translation.en: Hello, Joe. Can you refill my popcorn please? Extra butter.
translation.zh: 嗨 乔 能给我加满爆米花吗？多要黄油

translation.en: On it.
translation.zh: 没问题

translation.en: [Stacy, echoing in a memory] I love this Carnivale theme,
translation.zh: 我很爱这个嘉年华主题派对

translation.en: but your Candyland theme is going to be the best of the year.
translation.zh: 但你的糖果乐园主题派对 肯定是全年最棒的

translation.en: [Lydia, echoing] Well, until your New York theme puts the entire school to shame!
translation.zh: 然后你的纽约主题派对 会让整个学校的人蒙羞！

translation.en: [Stacy, echoing] Yeah.
translation.zh: 是啊

translation.en: [Stacy, echoing] Why'd we eat so many Twizzlers last night?
translation.zh: 我们昨晚怎么吃了那么多扭扭糖？

translation.en: [Lydia, echoing] I don't know!
translation.zh: 我也不知道！

translation.en: [Mateo] Hey, Stacy.
translation.zh: 嘿 斯泰西

translation.en: Oh, hey, Mateo.
translation.zh: 哦 嗨 马提奥

translation.en: Hey, can you believe no Bar or Bat Mitzvah tonight?

translation.en: Get to go to the movies.
translation.zh: 只能看电影了

translation.en: [chuckling] What are you seeing?
translation.zh: 你要看什么？

translation.en: I'm not sure. Andy bought the tickets.
translation.zh: 我也不确定 安迪买了票

translation.en: -Andy's here? -[Mateo] Yeah.
translation.zh: -安迪来了？ -对

translation.en: -Sorry, the butter nozzle's jammed. -No, it's fine. I don't need butter.
translation.zh: -抱歉 黄油喷嘴卡住了 -没事 没关系 我不要黄油了

translation.en: -All good. I know you love butter. -No, I really don't need butter.
translation.zh: -没事 我知道你喜欢黄油 -我不要黄油了

translation.en: I'll grab a coat hanger. This is all fixed.
translation.zh: 我去地下室拿个衣架 会修好的

translation.en: -Dude, give me the popcorn! -[Kym] Stacy Friedman.
translation.zh: -把爆米花给我就行了 -斯泰西费曼

translation.en: Hey, Kym! What's up?
translation.zh: 嘿 金 你好吗？

translation.en: Hey, yo, what's poppin'? How's the bookie business?
translation.zh: 嘿 哟 你好么？ 图书工作干得怎么样了？

translation.en: Booming. Still got your Xbox?
translation.zh: 很不错 你的游戏机还在呢？

translation.en: You know it.
translation.zh: 你懂的

translation.en: [Stacy] That's what's up.
translation.zh: 这就对了

translation.en: [Danny] Bubie, what's taking you so long?
translation.zh: 宝贝 你怎么用了这么久？

translation.en: Is the guy mad at us for getting three refills?
translation.zh: 那家伙生气了吗？因为我们续了三次

translation.en: Where is that dude?
translation.zh: 那家伙去哪里了？

translation.en: Oh, your friends are here.
translation.zh: 你的朋友们来了

translation.en: What's up, everybody? Nice to see you guys.
translation.zh: 大家好吗？很高兴见到你们

translation.en: -I like your robe, man! -Oh yeah, the kid likes the drip.
translation.zh: -我喜欢你的长袍 -这孩子喜欢我的外套

translation.en: I like your taste.
translation.zh: 我欣赏你的品味

translation.en: So I'm gonna go outside and get a blanket from the trunk of the car 'cause it's freezing in there.
translation.zh: 我要出去拿下后备箱里的毯子 因为里面太冷了

translation.en: We can kind of snuggle like we used to. All right?
translation.zh: 我们可以像以前那样 依偎在一起 好吗？

translation.en: Always fun, right? Blanket time? You know what I'm talking about, bro?
translation.zh: 总是很有趣 对吧？毛毯时光？ 你懂我的意思吧 哥们？

translation.en: -Wha-- -I see you back there, Lydia.
translation.zh: -什… -我看到你在后面呢 莉迪亚

translation.en: -How you doing, kiddo? -Oh, hey.
translation.zh: -你好吗 孩子？ -嗨

translation.en: -Love ya. Say hi to your folks. -Yeah, of course.
translation.zh: 爱你 跟你父母问好 好的 当然

translation.en: -[Danny] Miss you, buddy. -[Lydia] See you.
translation.zh: -想你 伙伴 -再见

translation.en: You-- Oh…
translation.zh: 你…哦

translation.en: [Tara] Stacy! We're here.
translation.zh: 斯泰西 我们来了

translation.en: Did you fall off a motorcycle?
translation.zh: 你从摩托车上摔下来了？

translation.en: -Did you eat nuts? Do you need an EpiPen? -Why do you look like a bad IG filter?
translation.zh: 你吃坚果了？要注射过敏药吗？ 怎么像用了很烂的滤镜？

translation.en: Can periods happen to your face?

translation.en: Shut up. Come in.
translation.zh: 闭嘴 进来

translation.en: -[Tara] What are you wearing? Oh my God. -[Nikki] Scandy!

translation.en: [Stacy] Guys…
translation.zh: 拜托你们

translation.en: [Nikki] Tara, you're putting the lighting in the camera. Okay, yeah.

translation.en: -Lift it higher. Make sure I'm glowing. -[Tara] I'm not built for this.
translation.zh: -抬高一点 让我闪闪发光 -我不适合干这个

translation.en: You know, I really thought we were just gonna hang out and make slime.
translation.zh: 我真的以为我们只是一起玩史莱姆泥

translation.en: Oh my God, we're women now.
translation.zh: 天 我们现在是女人了

translation.en: Maybe later.
translation.zh: 晚点再说吧

translation.en: How does this look?
translation.zh: 看起来怎么样？

translation.en: Like your goldfish died.
translation.zh: 像是你的金鱼死了一样

translation.en: Hey, just switch it up.
translation.zh: 嘿 快点摆吧

translation.en: -[Tara] Okay. -There you go.
translation.zh: -好 -这就对了

translation.en: Seduce me. Okay? Just seduce me. Oh, way better. Slay, queen.
