translation.en: Guys, this is so lame.
translation.zh: 伙计们 这简直太俗了

translation.en: I thought we could be, like, this iconic best friend trio, you know?
translation.zh: 我本以为我们能成为 经典的三人组 知道吗？

translation.en: Now that Lydia broke up with you and all.
translation.zh: 既然现在莉迪亚跟你分手了

translation.en: Uh-oh. Now you look like all the goldfish in the world just died.
translation.zh: 哎呀 你现在看起来像是 全世界所有的金鱼都死了

translation.en: [sighing] No, it's fine. Let's just take more pictures and then change outfits.
translation.zh: 不 没关系 我们再拍几张照片 然后换衣服

translation.en: -[Tara] There's more outfits? -That's-- Okay. Yeah.
translation.zh: -还有别的衣服？ -好吧 行

translation.en: -[Tara] Are you serious? -[Nikki] Geez, Stace.
translation.zh: -你是认真的吗？ -天啊 小斯

translation.en: [Ronnie] Whoa, what is happening?
translation.zh: 哇 这是怎么回事？

translation.en: Uh, taking pictures.
translation.zh: 在拍照

translation.en: You look insane.
translation.zh: 你看着像是疯子

translation.en: Uh, we're gonna go get some boba and then watch a movie,
translation.zh: 我们要去买点珍珠奶茶 然后看《鬼玩人2》

translation.en: Evil Dead 2, if you wanna come.
translation.zh: 我们要去买点珍珠奶茶 然后看《鬼玩人2》 -如果你们也想来的话 -好 就…

translation.en: -Yeah, just-- -Oh, thank God.
translation.zh: -如果你们也想来的话 -好 就…

translation.en: Yes!
translation.zh: -谢天谢地 -太好了

translation.en: What happened to your armpits?
translation.zh: 你的腋下怎么了？

translation.en: Oh, I shaved this morning. It did not go well.
translation.zh: 我今早刮了腋毛 不太顺利

translation.en: It's fine! I didn't need you anyway.
translation.zh: 没关系 反正我也不需要你们

translation.en: [Stacy] Don't you love puzzles?
translation.zh: 难道你不爱拼图吗？

translation.en: Puzzles are corny.
translation.zh: 拼图很老套

translation.en: Facts.
translation.zh: 确实如此

translation.en: I have a question. Is Lydia a good kisser?
translation.zh: 我有个问题 莉迪亚的接吻技术好吗？

translation.en: She's a'ight.
translation.zh: 她还行

translation.en: A'ight? Huh.
translation.zh: 还行？嗯

translation.en: Probably because you were her first kiss.
translation.zh: 可能是因为你是她的初吻

translation.en: No, she's told me she's kissed a bunch of guys before.
translation.zh: 不是 她告诉我说 她亲过很多男生

translation.en: At camp?
translation.zh: 在露营时？

translation.en: Yes.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: Does her tight-lipped technique suggest a high level of experience?
translation.zh: 她那紧闭双唇的吻技 能说明她很有经验吗？

translation.en: Nah, it's like she thinks she's kissing a stuffed animal or something.
translation.zh: 不能 感觉她以为 自己在和毛绒玩具之类的东西接吻

translation.en: Plus, every time I try to move my hand, she starts laughing,
translation.zh: 而且每次我一上手 她就开始笑

translation.en: says she's mad ticklish.
translation.zh: 她太怕痒了

translation.en: [scoffing] You have the patience of a saint.
translation.zh: 你简直有圣人般的耐心

translation.en: A Jewish saint.
translation.zh: 犹太圣人

translation.en: True.
translation.zh: 没错

translation.en: Twenty points for me.
translation.zh: 我得20分

translation.en: Get it, Grandma.
translation.zh: 厉害 奶奶

translation.en: Want a picture of you and your grandma to prove to your moms you're here?
translation.zh: 要不要拍一张你和奶奶的合影 向你妈妈证明来过？

translation.en: Uh, yeah. That's low-key a good idea.
translation.zh: 好啊 这主意不错

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: -[Andy] Yeah, Grandma. -Hilarious.
translation.zh: -不错嘛 奶奶 -真好笑

translation.en: I have to prove to Rabbi Rebecca I'm here too.
translation.zh: 我也得向瑞贝卡拉比证明我来过

translation.en: I'm volunteering for my mitzvah project.
translation.zh: 我在为成年礼善行做义工

translation.en: -That's what's up. -Here, I'll send it to you.
translation.zh: -原来是这样 -好了 我发给你

translation.en: -For sure. -Oh, shoot. I just sent you more pics.
translation.zh: -好的 -我靠 我给你多发了几张

translation.en: -Just ignore. -[cell phone] Andy Goldfarb.
translation.zh: -就当没看见 -安迪戈法布

translation.en: Nice.
translation.zh: 不错嘛

translation.en: -[Stacy] That one's way too big on me. -Okey-dokey.
translation.zh: -那件衣服太大了 -好吧

translation.en: Well, why don't you try the strapless one?
translation.zh: 那你试试无肩带的那件吧？

translation.en: [Bree] So, how's Lydia's entrance video coming along?
translation.zh: 莉迪亚的登场影片做得怎么样了？

translation.en: I finished it this weekend.
translation.zh: 我周末完成了

translation.en: [Bree] Great!
translation.zh: 太好了！

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 不行

translation.en: Why is it a no?
translation.zh: 为什么不行？

translation.en: [Stacy] Just-- it's just a no.
translation.zh: 就是不行

translation.en: Well, okay, then try the last one on.
translation.zh: 好吧 那就试试最后一件

translation.en: No, that's the worst one!
translation.zh: 不行 那件是最难看的！

translation.en: [Bree] Well, just try it!
translation.zh: 就试试吧！

translation.en: [whining] Oh my God.
translation.zh: 我的天

translation.en: -[sighing heavily] -[Stacy] It's so ugly, Mom.
translation.zh: 太丑了 妈妈

translation.en: Maybe it'll look good when it's on you.
translation.zh: 也许穿在你身上会很好看

translation.en: [gasping] Oh.
translation.zh: 哦

translation.en: You know what?
translation.zh: 你知道吗？

translation.en: I like this.
translation.zh: 我喜欢这身

translation.en: I look like the lady at school that pulls kids out of class
translation.zh: 我看起来像是学校辅导员 学生的家长出车祸时

translation.en: when their parents get into car accidents.
translation.zh: 她会把学生叫出教室

translation.en: How often does that happen?
translation.zh: 这种情况多久发生一次？

translation.en: Can we please get this dress? Come on. It's the dream dress.
translation.zh: 能不能买这条裙子？ 拜托 这可是梦想中的裙子

translation.en: It costs more than our house.
translation.zh: 比我们家房子还贵

translation.en: Okay, so wear the cheap dress in front of God. Got it.
translation.zh: 好吧 原来得在上帝面前 穿便宜的裙子 知道了

translation.en: [woman] It's not cheap.
translation.zh: 并不便宜

translation.en: It's reasonable.
translation.zh: 价格合理

translation.en: That's what every kid wants to hear on the most important day of their life.
translation.zh: 这是每个孩子 在人生中最重要的一天都想听到的

translation.en: "Wow, Stacy, you look so reasonable."
translation.zh: “哇 斯泰西 你看起来很合理”

translation.en: You know what? This is a nice,
translation.zh: 你知道吗？这身裙子很不错

translation.en: temple-friendly, well-priced dress. And--
translation.zh: 适合穿去圣殿 价格也适中 所以…

translation.en: No. Don't say it. Please, Mom. Please, I beg you.
translation.zh: 不要 别说出来 求你了 妈妈 求你了 我求求你

translation.en: -We're gettin' it. -Oh my God! You're ruining me!
translation.zh: -我们要买这条 -我的天 你这是在毁我！

translation.en: So ugly, Mom.
translation.zh: 太丑了 妈妈

translation.en: -So, is this, like, a swipe or a chip? -[cashier] Yeah, it's a chip.
translation.zh: -所以是这样刷还是插入？ -是的 要插入

translation.en: [Bree] Good? Okay. Wait, did I take it out too soon?
translation.zh: 好了吗？好的 等等 我是不是过早拿出来了？

translation.en: [Gabi] Why? We could color coordinate. [Lydia] We're not color coordinating, Mom. We're not doing that.
translation.zh: -为什么？我们可以用颜色搭配 -不行 我不要和你搭配颜色 妈妈

translation.en: -You want to ruin me? -[Gabi Okay. No.
translation.zh: -我可不想 你要毁了我吗？ -好吧 不行

translation.en: It looks like something the counselor at school wears, Mom.
translation.zh: 看起来像是学校辅导员穿的裙子

translation.en: -[Gabi] Okay, okay. -[Lydia] Please, I'm not wearing that.
translation.zh: -好吧 -求你了 我可不穿那件

translation.en: -[Eli] Yeah, I got that app too. -Eli!
translation.zh: -是的 那个我搞定了 -伊莱

translation.en: -[Eli] What? -[Gabi] What do you think?
translation.zh: -怎么？ -你觉得呢？

translation.en: [Eli] What? Uh, Rudy, hold on a second.
translation.zh: 鲁迪 等一下

translation.en: I'm at a family function or something, uh…
translation.zh: 我在尽家庭职责

translation.en: Yeah, that dress is gorgeous, kiddo. Only the best.
translation.zh: 没错 那身裙子很漂亮 孩子 只要最好的

translation.en: [Lydia] Papi, you don't even know which one we're talking about.
translation.zh: 爸爸 你根本不知道我们在说哪件

translation.en: It's the prettiest one. Just like you, pumpkin.
translation.zh: 这件是最漂亮的 就像你一样 小南瓜

translation.en: Twenty-three skidoo! Wee!
translation.zh: 速战速决 耶！

translation.en: Okay, yeah, I think you gave me a good price.
translation.zh: 对 是的 你给我的价格不错

translation.en: Mom? Mom, can we go?
translation.zh: 妈妈 可以走了吗？

translation.en: Yeah, okay. Take the dress.
translation.zh: 好吧 把裙子拿走

translation.en: -Thank you. -Okay.
translation.zh: -谢谢 -好

translation.en: So great. We got a great deal.
translation.zh: 太棒了 我们买的很划算

translation.en: Where's Daddy? I don't remember--
translation.zh: 爸爸呢？我不记得在哪边…

translation.en: -No. -[gasping] Gabi!
translation.zh: -不行 -嘉碧！

translation.en: Bree?!
translation.zh: 布丽？

translation.en: Lydia! Lydia's here--
translation.zh: 莉迪亚！莉迪亚也在这里

translation.en: Oh my God! I haven't seen you in forever!
translation.zh: 我的天 我好久没见到你了！

translation.en: [Bree] Hi!
translation.zh: 嗨！

translation.en: [Gabi] Just like the two of us to be getting dresses at the last minute.
translation.zh: 我们两个总是在最后时刻来买衣服

translation.en: [Bree] Why plan ahead, right?
translation.zh: 何必要提前计划呢 是吧？

translation.en: [Gabi] How are you? How's Stace?
translation.zh: 你好吗？小斯好吗？

translation.en: [Bree] She's good. I miss Lydia. She hasn't been over in a while.
translation.zh: 她挺好的 我很想念莉迪亚呢 她很久没来我家了

translation.en: Eli! It's so great to see you. How you doing?
translation.zh: 伊莱 见到你真是太好了 你好吗？

translation.en: Terrific. We're getting divorced.
translation.zh: 好极了 我们要离婚了

translation.en: Oh yeah. I'm-- I heard. I'm so sorry.
translation.zh: 哦 是啊 我听说了 很遗憾

translation.en: I'm not. I'm on six dating apps.
translation.zh: 我可不遗憾 我在用六个约会软件

translation.en: Six? Wow, that's a lot.
translation.zh: 六个？还真不少呢

translation.en: Andy broke up with me.
translation.zh: 安迪跟我分手了

translation.en: Hmm. Sorry to hear that. You were the perfect couple.
translation.zh: 真遗憾 你们本是完美的一对

translation.en: He said he couldn't deal with the ticklishness or the closed mouth kissing.
translation.zh: 他说他无法忍受我怕痒 还有闭着嘴接吻

translation.en: Sucks for you, I guess.
translation.zh: 那还真倒霉呢

translation.en: Said he heard I lied about kissing boys in camp.
translation.zh: 他说他听说 我对露营时亲吻男生的事撒谎了

translation.en: Well, you did lie. So…
translation.zh: 嗯 你确实撒谎了 所以…

translation.en: [Bree] See you at temple?
translation.zh: 圣殿见？

translation.en: -See you at temple. -Okay.
translation.zh: -圣殿见 -好

translation.en: Anyhoo. Gonna go.
translation.zh: 行吧 哟

translation.en: -[Bree] Happy shopping! -[Gabi] Yeah!
translation.zh: -购物开心！ -好！

translation.en: -Bye, Eli! Enjoy those dating apps. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -再见 伊莱 好好享受约会软件吧 -好

translation.en: -Bye, Stacy. -See ya! Come on, honey.
translation.zh: -再见 斯泰西 -再见 走吧 宝贝

translation.en: What's that mom's name again?
translation.zh: 那位妈妈叫什么来着？

translation.en: Bree.
translation.zh: 布丽

translation.en: Are you kidding me?
translation.zh: 你是认真的吗？

translation.en: You need to get your fat head in the game, Eli.
translation.zh: 你动动你那胖脑袋吧 伊莱

translation.en: Stacy's father, Danny, if you could remember names,
translation.zh: 斯泰西的爸爸 丹尼 如果你能记住名字的话

translation.en: who we've known since kindergarten, is so involved in every single detail!
translation.zh: 我们从幼儿园就认识他了 他总是认真处理每一个小细节！

translation.en: Oh, he is?
translation.zh: 是吗？

translation.en: So, which detail is that?
translation.zh: 那是哪个细节？

translation.en: -[Danny groaning] -He's exhausted from being a good dad.
translation.zh: 他当好爸爸累坏了

translation.en: Honey. You wish. [scoffing]
translation.zh: 亲爱的 想得美

translation.en: Can we get ice cream?
translation.zh: 我们能吃点冰淇淋吗？

translation.en: -Did you guys already get ice cream? -No, we didn't.
translation.zh: -你们已经吃过冰淇淋了吗？ -没有 我们没吃

translation.en: [in sing-song voice] Yes, Seema?
translation.zh: 怎么了 西玛？

translation.en: -Can I go to the bathroom? -[Rebecca] Yes you can.
translation.zh: -我可以去洗手间吗？ -好的 你可以

translation.en: Go pee-pee, but quickly.
translation.zh: 去尿尿吧 不过动作要快

translation.en: So quickly.
translation.zh: 动作要快

translation.en: -[Rebecca] Thank you, thank you! -Bravo! Slay, queen!
translation.zh: -谢谢！ -太棒了 女王酷毙了！

translation.en: Does anyone know the significance of that particular piece of music, huh?
translation.zh: 有人了解这段音乐的意义吗？

translation.en: Yes, Andy, please enlighten us.
translation.zh: 好的 安迪 来启发一下我们吧

translation.en: I gotta go to the bathroom too.
translation.zh: 我也要去洗手间

translation.en: No one thinks to take a whiz before they come to class?
translation.zh: 没人想过要在上课前尿尿吗？

translation.en: Fine, Andy, but quickly!
translation.zh: 好吧 安迪 但动作要快！

translation.en: -So quickly. -So quickly.
translation.zh: -动作要快 -动作要快

translation.en: [class] So quickly.
translation.zh: 动作要快

translation.en: [Jerry] Go, Andy.
translation.zh: 去吧 安迪

translation.en: [class] Go, Andy.
translation.zh: 去吧 安迪

translation.en: [Jerry] Good luck, Andy.
translation.zh: 祝你好运 安迪

translation.en: [class] Good luck, Andy.
translation.zh: 祝你好运 安迪

translation.en: Hopefully, it's not number two!
translation.zh: 但愿不是上大号

translation.en: [boy] It's Mr. Mateo!
translation.zh: 是马提奥先生！

translation.en: -Mr. Potatoes. -[girl] Mr. Potato.
translation.zh: -土豆先生 -土豆先生

translation.en: Hey, Stacy!
translation.zh: 嗨 斯泰西！

translation.en: Can't believe you're not even Jewish, and you come to temple more than I do.
translation.zh: 真是难以相信 你不是犹太人 却比我来得还勤快

translation.en: Yeah, I go to church every Sunday.
translation.zh: 是啊 我每周日都去教堂

translation.en: Might as well fill in the other six days for some, you know, holiness too.
translation.zh: 我只想在其余的六天里 也做些神圣的事情

translation.en: I'm actually going to help these guys make challah.
translation.zh: 我正准备帮这些家伙做些查拉面包

translation.en: -[kids] Challah! -Okay, okay! Challah, challah.
translation.zh: -是哈拉面包！ -对 是哈拉面包

translation.en: -That's what I said! -[Stacy laughing]
translation.zh: 我就是这么说的！

translation.en: I'm waiting here for Mrs. Lippman to unlock the kitchen.
translation.zh: 我正在这里 等利普曼太太打开厨房的门呢

translation.en: She's taking forever.
translation.zh: 她太慢了

translation.en: I remember when I had Mrs. Lippman, six years old, not a care in the world.
translation.zh: 我还记得利普曼太太 那时我六岁 是无忧无虑的年纪

translation.en: [girl] I got cares.
translation.zh: 我可有忧虑

translation.en: My mom says if I don't learn the candle blessings,
translation.zh: 我妈妈说 如果我不学会蜡烛祝福词

translation.en: I can't play Call of Duty anymore!
translation.zh: 我就不能再玩《使命召唤》了

translation.en: Oh, that's heavy.
translation.zh: 好苛刻啊

translation.en: Or maybe Mr. Mateo will teach you. He probably knows it by now.
translation.zh: 也许马提奥先生会教你 他应该已经背熟了

translation.en: -Mrs. Lippman! -[mouthing] Bye.
translation.zh: 利普曼太太！

translation.en: See you later, Stacy.
translation.zh: 回头见 斯泰西

translation.en: -Hi, Mike. -[Mike] Shalom, Stacy.
translation.zh: -嗨 迈克 -平安 斯泰西

translation.en: What's up?
translation.zh: 你好吗？

translation.en: Hi.
translation.zh: 嗨

translation.en: [Andy] Hey, uh…
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: Have you ever kissed anyone?
translation.zh: 你和别人接过吻吗？

translation.en: Uh, no.
translation.zh: 没有

translation.en: Would you want to?
translation.zh: 你愿意试试吗？

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: All right, come on, let's go.
translation.zh: 好 来吧 我们走

translation.en: Come on.
translation.zh: 来吧

translation.en: -[girl] Um, someone's in here! -[boy] Go away!
translation.zh: -里面有人！ -走开！

translation.en: [whispering] Where could we go?
translation.zh: 我们还能去哪里呢？

translation.en: Come on. Let's go.
translation.zh: 来 我们走吧

translation.en: No one's gonna find us in here.
translation.zh: 不会有人在这里找到我们的

translation.en: I don't know, I just feel like God's gonna be mad.
translation.zh: 我也说不上来 我只是觉得这样做上帝会生气

translation.en: Nah, God's gonna be stoked that we like each other so much.
translation.zh: 不会的 我们这么喜欢彼此 上帝肯定会很开心

translation.en: You're right.
translation.zh: 你说得对

translation.en: This is not the bathroom!
translation.zh: 这里可不是洗手间！

translation.en: [whispering] Oh no.
translation.zh: 糟了

translation.en: [Rebecca] Do you see a toilet?!
translation.zh: 你们看到厕所了吗？

translation.en: I didn't think so!
translation.zh: 我想也没有！

translation.en: I didn't need to go.
translation.zh: 我不需要上厕所

translation.en: Well, mazel tov, you guys are married now.
translation.zh: 祝贺 你们现在已经结婚了

translation.en: Kidding, but you're in a lot of trouble.
translation.zh: 开玩笑 但你们可是惹大麻烦了

translation.en: In front of the Torah? What were you thinking?
translation.zh: 在《妥拉》面前？你到底在想什么？

translation.en: I said I was sorry. Why is Andy not getting in trouble?
translation.zh: 我已经道歉了 为什么安迪没事？

translation.en: Oh, he's in trouble! He's a repeat offender. We're handling it.
translation.zh: 他的麻烦可大了！ 他是重犯 我们正在处理

translation.en: I hope my father doesn't handle it.
translation.zh: 但愿别交给我父亲处理

translation.en: He'll put him in a wood chipper. They'll never find his body.
translation.zh: 他会把他放在碎木机里 他们永远都找不到他的尸体

translation.en: Seema, we're only a few weeks away from your Bat Mitz. Okay, cutie-pops?
translation.zh: 西玛 你的成年礼 只剩下几周时间了 好吗 小可爱？

translation.en: This is supposed to be the most important day of your life,
translation.zh: 这该是你人生中最重要的一天

translation.en: and you're not taking it seriously at all.
translation.zh: 可你一点儿也不认真对待

translation.en: You haven't even done your mitzvah project yet.
translation.zh: 你还没做你的成年礼善行

translation.en: I did my mitzvah project. I volunteered at the retirement home.
translation.zh: 我已经做了 我在养老院做志愿者来着

translation.en: So you could do a mitzvah, or so you could flirt with a boy?
translation.zh: 那是为了做善行 还是为了和某个男孩调情？

translation.en: How did you know that?
translation.zh: 你怎么知道的？

translation.en: Let's just say there's a wonderful woman there, Mrs. O'Leary,
translation.zh: 这么说吧 那里有位了不起的女士 奥莉瑞夫人

translation.en: who wishes to convert to Judaism, and you never brought her bookies!
translation.zh: 她很想改信犹太教 但你从不给她图书！

translation.en: Yeah, you're not the only one who's amazing at impressions.
translation.zh: 没错 会模仿别人的人可不止你一个

translation.en: I'll do better.
translation.zh: 我会更加努力的

translation.en: Let me take off my "rabbi hat" for a second
translation.zh: 我先暂时摘下“拉比”的帽子

translation.en: and put on my "tough love hat."
translation.zh: 戴上我的“严厉的爱”帽子

translation.en: If you don't shape up, your Bat Mitzvah is gonna be cancelled, sis.
translation.zh: 你要是不振作起来 你的成年礼就会被取消 姐妹

translation.en: And that's the way the hamantaschen crumbles. Capisce?
translation.zh: 这就是犹太教的规定 明白吗？

translation.en: Yes, we understand, Rabbi Rebecca.
translation.zh: 是的 我们明白了 瑞贝卡拉比

translation.en: She doesn't really even deserve a second chance. We thank you for that.
translation.zh: 她甚至不值得再给一次机会 我们为此感谢你

translation.en: Oh, and just please calm your husband down.
translation.zh: 拜托让你的老公冷静一下

translation.en: Okay? Tell him don't put Andy Goldfarb in a wood chipper.
translation.zh: 好的 告诉他 别把安迪戈法布放进碎木机里

translation.en: -[Bree] She just walked in. -[Rebecca] Oh. Okay, good luck.
translation.zh: -她刚到家 -哦 好的 祝你好运

translation.en: Dad, take a breath. Just talk to her. Don't yell.
translation.zh: 爸爸 深呼吸 跟她好好聊聊 别吼她

translation.en: He didn't take a breath.
translation.zh: 他没有深呼吸

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 没有

translation.en: Hey. We don't slam doors in this house.
translation.zh: 喂 这个家里的人不许撞门

translation.en: -Dad, I need a break. -[Danny] Well, welcome to being an adult.
translation.zh: -爸爸 我要休息一下 -好吧 欢迎来到成年人的生活

translation.en: And welcome to being Jewish. We don't get breaks.
translation.zh: 欢迎来到犹太人的世界 我们没有休息时间

translation.en: Oh my God! Stop!
translation.zh: 天啊 别说了！

translation.en: [Danny] Kissing a boy in a temple? You know how disrespectful that is?
translation.zh: 在圣殿里和男生接吻？ 你知道那有多不礼貌吗？

translation.en: Every time you walk into that synagogue, you are declaring to everyone and God,
translation.zh: 你每一次走进犹太会堂 就是在向所有人和上帝宣示

translation.en: "I'm Jewish, and I am part of this!"
translation.zh: “我是犹太人 我是这其中的一员！”

translation.en: Well, maybe I don't want to be!
translation.zh: 也许我并不想呢！

translation.en: Yes, you do!
translation.zh: 你当然想！

translation.en: I was born into God's kingdom!
translation.zh: 我出生在上帝的国度里！

translation.en: Yeah? Well, God wants you out right now! How's that?
translation.zh: 是吗？上帝现在想让你出去！如何？

translation.en: -I hate you! -[Danny] You don't mean that.
translation.zh: 我恨你！ 这不是你的真心话

translation.en: Wow, I never said that to him, and I was nuts.
translation.zh: 哇 我那时可疯了 但都没跟他说过这种话

translation.en: -[Danny] You hate me?! -[knocking on door]
translation.zh: 你不恨我！

translation.en: [Stacy] I do. You're a jerk, and you won't let me have a mojito bar.
translation.zh: 我恨你 你是个混蛋 你都不让我搞莫吉托吧台

translation.en: Gabi!
translation.zh: 嘉碧！

translation.en: Hi!
translation.zh: 嗨！

translation.en: [Danny] That's why we fought the Nazis? So you could have a mojito bar?
translation.zh: 我们和纳粹打仗是为了这个吗？ 为了让你搞莫吉托吧台？

translation.en: Is this a bad time?
translation.zh: 我来得不是时候吧？

translation.en: -Um, no. What's… what's going on? -[Danny] Are you nuts?
translation.zh: -没事 怎么了？ -你疯了吗？

translation.en: Well, Stacy was supposed to do that video for Lydia's Bat Mitzvah.
translation.zh: 斯泰西说好为莉迪亚的成年礼做影片

translation.en: Oh, yeah, yeah. Of course, right.
translation.zh: 是啊 当然

translation.en: [Stacy] Get out of my room! Stop ruining my life!
translation.zh: 滚出我的房间 别再毁我的人生了！

translation.en: -Anyways-- -[Danny] I paid for this room!
translation.zh: -总之… -这个房间是我花钱买的！

translation.en: She never sent it.
translation.zh: 她一直都没发过来 我在这附近办事

translation.en: I was in the neighborhood, and thought I'd pop by and see if it was ready.
translation.zh: 她一直都没发过来 我在这附近办事 就想过来看看是否准备好了

translation.en: -[screaming] -[Danny] Really?
translation.zh: 真的吗？

translation.en: Oh, hi, Ronnie. Hi, Zaara. How's it going?
translation.zh: 嗨 萝妮 嗨 扎拉 你们好吗？

translation.en: [Danny] Andy Goldfarb? That's who you pick?
translation.zh: 安迪戈法布？你居然选了这种人？

translation.en: [both] Great! Nice to see you.
translation.zh: 很不错 很高兴见到你！

translation.en: You girls got so big. How's high school?
translation.zh: 你们真是长大了 高中生活如何？

translation.en: [Stacy] You'll be the reason I start doing drugs!
translation.zh: 我如果开始嗑药 就是因为你！

translation.en: [Danny] Same here!
translation.zh: 彼此彼此！

translation.en: Hard.
translation.zh: 很艰难

translation.en: Very, very stressful.
translation.zh: 压力很大

translation.en: [Danny] Good God!
translation.zh: 天啊！

translation.en: Um, I think that Stacy said she finished the video this weekend,
translation.zh: 斯泰西好像说过 这周末已经把影片做完了

translation.en: so I can just email it to you ASAP.
translation.zh: 我这就用邮件给你发过去

translation.en: Thanks. Lydia keeps talking about how she doesn't wanna have a video anymore.
translation.zh: 谢谢 莉迪亚一直在说 她不想搞登场影片了

translation.en: -I know she'd regret it. -[Danny] You're on your own! Good luck!
translation.zh: -她肯定会后悔 -你靠自己吧！

translation.en: [Stacy, shouting] I hope you die before Mom!
translation.zh: 我希望你比妈妈早死！

translation.en: -[Danny] I'm taking you with me! -We'll see you. Mazel tov! Bye!
translation.zh: -好啊 我会和你同归于尽！ -好 稍后见 祝贺 再见

translation.en: [Danny] Andy Goldfarb is going in the goddamn wood chipper!
translation.zh: 我要把安迪戈法布 扔进该死的碎木机！

translation.en: -[keyboard clicking] -Okay.
translation.zh: 好了

translation.en: [Stacy, narrating] Dear God, Stacy here.
translation.zh: 亲爱的上帝 我是斯泰西

translation.en: So, as you probably already know, Lydia's Bat Mitzvah is coming up,
translation.zh: 你可能已经知道了 莉迪亚的成年礼马上就要来临

translation.en: and I really don't know what to do.
translation.zh: 我真的不知道该怎么办

translation.en: I'm not even sure if she wants me there.
translation.zh: 甚至不知道她是否希望我去参加

translation.en: [Stacy, continuing] If I was in this situation a month ago, I would've asked my friends what to do.
translation.zh: 如果我在一个月前遇到这种情况 我会询问朋友该怎么办

translation.en: Hey, look, we're twinning.
translation.zh: 嘿 看呀 我们在“闺蜜搭配”

translation.en: [Megan] Twinning?
translation.zh: “闺蜜搭配”？

translation.en: What are we in fourth grade?
translation.zh: 我们是四年级小孩儿么？

translation.en: [Stacy, continuing] But the people I'm hanging out with now,
translation.zh: 但现在和我一起玩的人

translation.en: I don't know if they'd have such good advice.
translation.zh: 我不知道他们会不会提供好建议

translation.en: [Stacy, narrating] I've actually been working hard
translation.zh: 我其实一直在努力

translation.en: because I want to have a good Bat Mitzvah and a good life.
translation.zh: 因为我想办一次好的成年礼 拥有一个好的人生

translation.en: I don't know how to fix things with Lydia,
translation.zh: 我不知道如何修补和莉迪亚的关系

translation.en: or if I should,
translation.zh: 或者是否该修补

translation.en: or if it's even possible.
translation.zh: 或者甚至能否修补

translation.en: Booyah!
translation.zh: 好嘞！

translation.en: So I've been focusing on my new mitzvah project.
translation.zh: 我也一直在专注计划我的成年礼善行

translation.en: [Stacy, narrating] And maybe, if I start doing good things…
translation.zh: 或许如果我开始做好事的话

translation.en: I got you.
translation.zh: 帮你搞定了

translation.en: …good things will start happening to me.
translation.zh: 好事也会发生在我身上

translation.en: Thanks.
translation.zh: 谢啦

translation.en: [Stacy, continuing] That's more of a Buddhist concept than a Jewish one,
translation.zh: 比起犹太教 这更像是佛教的观念

translation.en: but, hey, at this point, I'm--
translation.zh: 不过事到如今 我…

translation.en: [Schmuley] Friedman?
translation.zh: 费曼？

translation.en: What the hell are you doing?
translation.zh: 你到底在干什么？

translation.en: Your meter was expired.
translation.zh: 你的停车费过期了

translation.en: Yes, I wanted it to be expired.
translation.zh: 没错 我是故意的

translation.en: The meter maid is a sexual icon, and I wanted a chance to hit on her.
translation.zh: 那个交通女警可性感了 我在制造机会和她搭讪

translation.en: Now I have to wait 45 minutes!
translation.zh: 现在我得等45分钟才行！

translation.en: You're not supposed to call them meter maids.
translation.zh: 你不应该管她们叫交通女警

translation.en: And why are you in a handicapped spot?
translation.zh: 你为什么停在残障人士的车位？

translation.en: Everybody loves a bad boy.
translation.zh: 大家都爱坏男孩嘛

translation.en: Gross. That's a $500 fine.
translation.zh: 恶心 你得交500美元罚金

translation.en: Huh?
translation.zh: 啊？

translation.en: What the heck, man?
translation.zh: 搞什么鬼 老兄？

translation.en: It was her fault!
translation.zh: 都是她的错！

translation.en: -[man] Her? -[Schmuley] She did it!
translation.zh: 是她 是她做的！

translation.en: -[man] We know that kid. -What?
translation.zh: -对 我们认识那孩子 -什么？

translation.en: -She goes out with the basketball guy. -Exactly.
translation.zh: -她在和那个篮球男生约会 -没错

translation.en: [Bree] Stace?
translation.zh: 小斯？

translation.en: [Bree] Honey?
translation.zh: 亲爱的？

translation.en: Why aren't you ready yet?
translation.zh: 你怎么还没准备好呢？

translation.en: I don't want to go.
translation.zh: 我不想去

translation.en: [Bree] Yes, you do.
translation.zh: 你当然想去了

translation.en: This is Lydia's Bat Mitzvah.
translation.zh: 这可是莉迪亚的成年礼

translation.en: -She doesn't even want me there. -[Bree] Honey.
translation.zh: 她根本不想让我去 亲爱的

translation.en: I don't know what's happening between you two,
translation.zh: 我不知道你们俩之间发生了什么

translation.en: but I know things must feel really messed up right now.
translation.zh: 但我知道你现在肯定感觉很糟

translation.en: I know she hurt you, but I'm sure she misses her best friend.
translation.zh: 我知道她伤害了你 但她肯定也很想念她的挚友

translation.en: You need to make things right.
translation.zh: 你得弥补这件事

translation.en: -Okay? -[Stacy] Yeah.
translation.zh: -好吗？ -对

translation.en: [Bree] Okay, I think you should wear this towel.
translation.zh: 好吧 我觉得你应该戴着这条毛巾

translation.en: -It's a good accessory. -It's very stylish.
translation.zh: -可以当个不错的配饰 -非常时尚

translation.en: -Don't you think? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -你不觉得吗？ -对

translation.en: Oy! Hey! Hey, slow down!
translation.zh: 噢 喂 慢点！

translation.en: -Feel the breeze, Grandma! -Oh my, ah!
translation.zh: -感受微风吹拂吧 奶奶！ -天啊！

translation.en: I can see why you fell for him so hard.
translation.zh: 我大概能懂你为什么这么喜欢他了

translation.en: -[Danny] Yeah. Lydia gets the suit. -[Bree] Oh, it's for Lydia.
translation.zh: 是莉迪亚

translation.en: -We love you guys! -Thank you for coming.
translation.zh: -我们爱你们 -谢谢你们过来

translation.en: [Bree] Lydia! Look at you!
translation.zh: 莉迪亚 瞧瞧你！

translation.en: Oh my God!
translation.zh: 我的天！

translation.en: -This is exquisite! -[inaudible]
translation.zh: 真是太漂亮了！

translation.en: Gabi, you've outdone yourself, girl. Really, it's gorgeous.
translation.zh: 嘉碧 你办得太出色了 真的好漂亮

translation.en: [Gabi] Stacy, I'm so glad you came!
translation.zh: 斯泰西 你来了 我太高兴了！

translation.en: Lydia said you've been so busy with show choir.
translation.zh: 莉迪亚说你一直忙着表演合唱团的事

translation.en: Yeah, the show's going really great.
translation.zh: 是啊 表演进行得很顺利

translation.en: [Gabi] That's exciting.
translation.zh: 好期待啊

translation.en: Can you girls believe it?
translation.zh: 你们敢相信吗？

translation.en: You've been planning this your whole lives, and it's finally here!
translation.zh: 你一辈子都在为这一天做准备 现在终于到来了！

translation.en: Uh, well, it's time to get hammered.
translation.zh: 得去喝个烂醉了

translation.en: [chuckling] Okay.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: Ooh, maybe he'll pass out.
translation.zh: 说不定他会昏过去

translation.en: You! I saw you today at temple. The Haftarah. [smacking lips] Spot on.
translation.zh: 你呀 我今天在圣殿里见到你了 先知书选段读得太棒了

translation.en: -Thank you, Mr. Friedman. -Lydia, you look so pretty!
translation.zh: -谢谢 费曼先生 -莉迪亚 你好漂亮！

translation.en: [Lydia] Well, thank you.
translation.zh: 嗯 谢谢

translation.en: -You got the Twizzlers station? -Yeah, it's back there. I got it for you.
translation.zh: -你安排了扭扭糖果台？ -是啊 在后面 为你准备的

translation.en: [sing-songy] Your New York theme is gonna be amazing! [in accent] Thank you for coming, madam.
translation.zh: 你的纽约主题派对一定会很精彩！ 谢谢你来参与 女士

translation.en: [in accent] Well, thank you for inviting me.
translation.zh: 谢谢你邀请我

translation.en: [Nikki] Lyd! There you are!
translation.zh: 小莉 你在这里呢！

translation.en: -[Tara] Hey! -You're up! Come on!
translation.zh: -喂！ -该你上台了 快来！

translation.en: Ready for your grand entrance?
translation.zh: 准备好隆重登场了吗？

translation.en: [in accent] Come on! Places, cutie-pops.
translation.zh: 快去吧 各就各位 小可爱们

translation.en: -See you after. -That's a good impression.
translation.zh: -再见 -模仿得不错

translation.en: [Gabi] See you. Bye, Ronnie!
translation.zh: 到时候见 再见 萝妮

translation.en: -That felt good, huh? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -感觉不错吧？ -是啊

translation.en: -Wow! -Wow!
translation.zh: 哇！

translation.en: -[Bree] Hey! -[Danny] Oh, hey!
translation.zh: -喂！ -艾尔沃德 嘿！

translation.en: We're sitting with the Lamonsoffs. I love it!
translation.zh: 我们和拉蒙索夫家一起坐 太好了！

translation.en: Good to see ya.
translation.zh: 很高兴见到你

translation.en: What up?
translation.zh: 怎么了？

translation.en: [man] You ready, DJ? The party's starting.
translation.zh: 唱片骑士 你准备好了吗？ 派对要开始了

translation.en: All right, I'll be right there! I'm just getting my mind right!
translation.zh: 好 我马上过去 我在做上台前的思想准备！

translation.en: It's Schmuley time.
translation.zh: 轮到史姆利上场了

translation.en: So let's go.
translation.zh: 我们走吧

translation.en: All right! Put your hands up in the air like you just don't care, because…
translation.zh: 好嘞 举起你们的双手 肆意狂欢吧 大家！

translation.en: It is officially Lydia Katz Rodriguez's Bat Mitzvah!
translation.zh: 莉迪亚卡茨罗德里格斯的 成年礼正式开始了！

translation.en: [Schmuley] Woo! Oh yeah, you got it, Grandma!
translation.zh: 没错 就是这样 老奶奶！

translation.en: Yeah, nobody does it like DJ Schmuley, huh?
translation.zh: 谁都比不过史姆利唱片骑师 是吧？

translation.en: I guess.
translation.zh: 也许吧

translation.en: My little sweet baby.
translation.zh: 我可爱的小宝贝

translation.en: Bubelah!
translation.zh: 小宝贝！

translation.en: Tatelah!
translation.zh: 小宝宝！

translation.en: Meydelah!
translation.zh: 小姑娘！

translation.en: Shayna punim!
translation.zh: 漂亮的小脸蛋！

translation.en: -Remember that? Kindergarten, first day? -Yeah, yeah.
translation.zh: -还记得吗？幼儿园第一天？ -是啊

translation.en: Yeah, you took my parking spot.
translation.zh: 没错 你占了我的停车位

translation.en: Mm-hmm. Not sure that was me, but either way. Okay.
translation.zh: -不确定是不是我 但随便吧 -好吧

translation.en: If that was you and a boy, what would you do?
translation.zh: 假设那是你和一个男孩 你会怎么做？

translation.en: [Stacy, on video] We're waiting for her to pop a pimple.
translation.zh: -我们在等她挤出粉刺 -小斯 怎么回事？

translation.en: Stace, what's going on? What are you doing?
translation.zh: -我们在等她挤出粉刺 -小斯 怎么回事？ 你要干什么？

translation.en: Look at that.
translation.zh: 你瞧瞧

translation.en: [Stacy, on video] Why do you always do that?
translation.zh: 你为什么总是这样？

translation.en: Because I like the way my feet smell!
translation.zh: 因为我喜欢自己脚的味道！

translation.en: [Stacy, on video] This isn't normal!
translation.zh: 这可不正常！

translation.en: Schmuley, turn off the video. Please, please, please! Schmuley! Turn off the video!
translation.zh: 史姆利 关掉视频 拜托你！ 史姆利 关掉视频！

translation.en: It's getting big reactions. What's wrong with it?
translation.zh: 大家的反响很大 怎么了？

translation.en: It's getting a horrible reaction! Please, just turn it off!
translation.zh: 反响很差 拜托你关掉吧！

translation.en: -[all laughing] -[Tara] She sounds like a lawnmower.
translation.zh: 她的打呼声像割草机

translation.en: That was not a snore!
translation.zh: 那不是打呼声！

translation.en: -[Lydia] What's that smell? -Oh God.
translation.zh: -有味道吗？ -天啊

translation.en: [Lydia] Kym and Megan and Anya, they suck. They're horrible.
translation.zh: 金和梅根还有安雅 她们很烂、很差劲

translation.en: Oh, I want cute, designer stuff, but make sure it's, like, eco-friendly.
translation.zh: 我要漂亮的名牌东西 但必须是环保的

translation.en: -I'm sorry. -[Lydia] They're very dumb.
translation.zh: -对不起 -她们很蠢

translation.en: It's kinda true though.
translation.zh: 但确实是这样

translation.en: Shut up! It's not.
translation.zh: 闭嘴 天啊！

translation.en: -I got a full booger. -Stop! Erase that right now. Please!
translation.zh: -我拍到你的大鼻涕了 -别拍了 拜托你立刻删除

translation.en: [Stacy, on video] Her real toes are hairy.
translation.zh: 她的脚趾上毛发很多

translation.en: [Lydia] Remember when that string on my tampon broke?
translation.zh: 还记得我棉条上的绳子断了吗？

translation.en: I think I peed myself!
translation.zh: 我的天 我好像尿裤子了！

translation.en: Oh my God.
translation.zh: 我的天

translation.en: Have you ever farted from the front?
translation.zh: 你有没有从前面放过屁？

translation.en: [Stacy, on video] Yeah, like your vajayjay?
translation.zh: 你是说从小咪咪那里？

translation.en: -[Lydia] Want me to show you? -[Stacy] Yes.
translation.zh: 想要我展示吗？

translation.en: [Lydia] I have to prepare.
translation.zh: -好 我来看看 -我得准备下

translation.en: [Lydia] I was showing them how to queef.
translation.zh: 我在教她们如何用咪咪排气

translation.en: [woman] Is that what kids talk about today? Tampons and frontal farts?
translation.zh: 现如今的孩子们都谈论这些吗？ 卫生棉条和前面放屁？

translation.en: You better not show this to anyone.
translation.zh: 你最好别给任何人看这个

translation.en: Oh my God.
translation.zh: 我的天

translation.en: I swear to God, if you show this to anyone…
translation.zh: 我对上帝发誓 如果你给任何人看 我绝对…

translation.en: -Schmuley did this? -I… I--
translation.zh: -这是史姆利干的？ -我…

translation.en: Schmuley?
translation.zh: 史姆利？

translation.en: Thanks for watching, bye!
translation.zh: 谢谢收看 再见！

translation.en: -Why would Stacy do that? -I don't know.
translation.zh: -斯泰西为什么要这样？ -不知道

translation.en: Okay, even I'm not that mean.
translation.zh: 好吧 哪怕我都不会这么坏

translation.en: -You're pretty mean. -Yeah, you suck.
translation.zh: -你也挺坏的 -没错 你很烂

translation.en: Turn it off, turn it off!
translation.zh: 关掉！

translation.en: Lydia! Lydia, I didn't mean to-- [Lydia] Stop! You didn't mean to?
translation.zh: -莉迪亚 我不是故意… -别说了 你不是故意的？

translation.en: Like you didn't mean to tell everyone I had a black hair on my nipple,
translation.zh: 就像你不是故意告诉大家 我的乳头上有黑毛？

translation.en: or that Andy was my first kiss?
translation.zh: 或者安迪是我的初吻？

translation.en: -No, but this is different! -Just stop lying, Stacy!
translation.zh: -不 但这次不一样！ -别再说谎了 斯泰西！

translation.en: I have tried to apologize, but you keep punishing me!
translation.zh: 我一直想跟你道歉 但你总是在惩罚我！

translation.en: -When is it enough, Stacy? -Now, it's enough!
translation.zh: -什么时候才算够 斯泰西？ -现在已经够了！

translation.en: It's too late!
translation.zh: 太迟了！

translation.en: [Gabi] Lydia!
translation.zh: 莉迪亚！

translation.en: I should go up and see her. I gotta talk to her.
translation.zh: 我应该上去看看她 我得跟她聊聊

translation.en: No, I'm the one who sent the damn video. I should go.
translation.zh: 不 发视频的人是我 应该我去

translation.en: Neither of you guys should go up there. She needs to process this herself.
translation.zh: 你们俩都不该上去 她需要自己消化一下这件事

translation.en: No, honey, she needs--
translation.zh: 不 亲爱的 她要…

translation.en: I know what she needs 'cause I know how she's feeling.
translation.zh: 我知道她需要什么 因为我了解她的感受

translation.en: How would you know what she's feeling?
translation.zh: 你怎么会了解她的感受？

translation.en: Even your crazy ass never did anything that stupid.
translation.zh: 连你这种疯子都没做过这么蠢的事

translation.en: True, but I've seen some similar TikToks.
translation.zh: 没错 但我在抖音上看过类似的东西

translation.en: And the "even your crazy ass" was gaslighting.
translation.zh: “连你这种疯子” 这可是情感操控

translation.en: Yeah, you're right. Sorry about that.
translation.zh: 对 你说得对 抱歉

translation.en: This is gonna be difficult for you to hear, Danny and Bree,
translation.zh: 这话可能不好听 丹尼 布丽

translation.en: but from this point forward,
translation.zh: 但从现在开始

translation.en: there's going to be a whole huge part of Stacy that you don't understand,
translation.zh: 斯泰西会变得越来越难以理解

translation.en: that you won't ever understand, no matter how much you want to,
translation.zh: 无论多渴望 你们可能永远都理解不了

translation.en: and that's just the way it is.
translation.zh: 事情就是这样

translation.en: Don't ever call us Danny and Bree again, Zaara.
translation.zh: 不许再叫我们丹尼和布丽 扎拉

translation.en: Yeah, that was weird.
translation.zh: 是啊 感觉很奇怪

translation.en: Sorry, Mr. and Mrs. Friedman.
translation.zh: 抱歉 费曼先生和夫人

translation.en: To me, that was gaslighting.
translation.zh: 我认为那才是情感操控

translation.en: [Stacy, narrating] God, everything is such a mess.
translation.zh: 上帝 一切都变得乱七八糟

translation.en: I've never felt this way before.
translation.zh: 我以前从未有过这种感觉

translation.en: And I don't know how to fix it.
translation.zh: 而我也不知道该怎么修复

translation.en: [Stacy, narrating] Well, I'm sure you got this day marked in your holy calendar too,
translation.zh: 我知道你在圣日日历上 肯定也标记了今天这个日子

translation.en: but today is my Bat Mitzvah.
translation.zh: 但我还是想说 今天是我的成年礼

translation.en: The most important day of my Jewish life.
translation.zh: 是我的犹太人生中最重要的一天

translation.en: Maybe even my entire life.
translation.zh: 甚至也许是我整个人生中

translation.en: But what's the point?
translation.zh: 但现在有什么意义？

translation.en: [Bree] Let's do this!
translation.zh: 我们来吧！

translation.en: You're kidding me. Again?
translation.zh: 你在开玩笑呢 又来？

translation.en: This time, I'm serious. I am not going.
translation.zh: 这次我是认真的 我不去

translation.en: Oh, you're going. Get dressed. Get in the car.
translation.zh: 你必须去 换上衣服 然后上车

translation.en: -I can't, and I won't. -[tense music playing]
translation.zh: 我不能去 我也不会去

translation.en: Okay, fine. Say goodbye to your phone.
translation.zh: 那好吧 跟你的手机说再见吧

translation.en: Fine. Who am I texting anyway?
translation.zh: 好吧 反正我也没人可联系

translation.en: There is nothing you can say or do that will make me go.
translation.zh: 不论你说什么、做什么 我都不会去

translation.en: I'm an adult today, and I can make my own decisions,
translation.zh: 我今天成年了 我可以自己做决定

translation.en: and I have decided that I am staying here.
translation.zh: 我决定留在这里

translation.en: -[screaming] Put me down, put me down! -[Danny] Hey. Come on. Hey.
translation.zh: -放我下来！ -喂 来吧

translation.en: Ronnie! [screaming]
translation.zh: 萝妮！

translation.en: That is some amazing parenting right there.
translation.zh: 真是了不起的家教

translation.en: -[Stacy] No! Don't! [screaming] -[Danny] Hey.
translation.zh: -不 不要！ -嘿

translation.en: Hey, how are those armpits doing?
translation.zh: 嘿 你的腋窝怎么样了？

translation.en: You know how they say that it grows back double?
translation.zh: 大家不是说长回来的时候会加倍吗？

translation.en: It's growing back triple. Oh.
translation.zh: -我的加了三倍 -噢

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 是啊

translation.en: -[Stacy screaming] -[Bree] Pull it together!
translation.zh: 抓住她！

translation.en: -[Danny] Calm down. -I don't want to go.
translation.zh: -冷静 -我不想去

translation.en: Can you stop? H-hey! Hey! Hey! Hey!
translation.zh: 你能不能别闹了？ 我们不在乎你的想法 嗨！

translation.en: Shabbat shalom.
translation.zh: 祝愿平安

translation.en: Today is a very special day.
translation.zh: 今天是非常特别的一天

translation.en: Our brilliant, young Stacy Friedman is called to the bimah for her Bat Mitzvah.
translation.zh: 我们年轻、优秀的斯泰西费曼 被召唤至圣坛 以进行成年礼

translation.en: [Stacy, narrating] Oh, God. Do you hear her calling me up to receive an honor I do not deserve?
translation.zh: 上帝啊 你听到了吗？ 她召唤我来接受我不配得到的荣誉

translation.en: I've been dreaming about this day my whole life, and now it's here.
translation.zh: 我这辈子一直在梦想着这一天 这一天终于到了

translation.en: And I wish I could go back in bed, or under my bed, or literally anywhere--
translation.zh: 但我却希望回到床上 或者躲在床下 哪怕是任何地方…

translation.en: [Rebecca] Seema?
translation.zh: 西玛？

translation.en: asher bachar banu mikol…
translation.zh: （预留：伊莱罗德里格斯） （预留：嘉碧卡茨）

translation.en: [Stacy slowing] ha-amim…
translation.zh: （预留：莉迪亚罗德里格斯卡茨）

translation.en: I made a huge mistake. [sniffling]
translation.zh: 我犯了个大错

translation.en: I'm sorry. I don't even know what I'm doing up here.
translation.zh: 对不起 我甚至不知道自己在这里做什么

translation.en: In the Jewish religion, I am supposed to be a grown-up today.
translation.zh: 在犹太教信仰中 我今天应该成为了成年人

translation.en: But I have been so selfish and bratty and annoying to my parents who just want…
translation.zh: 但我一直表现得自私、刁蛮 惹我的父母生气 他们只想…

translation.en: [Stacy, narrating] And then, it happened.
translation.zh: 事情就这样发生了

translation.en: The very day I was supposed to become a woman
translation.zh: 我要成为女人的这一天

translation.en: is the day that everything started to make sense.
translation.zh: 一切都开始变得合理了

translation.en: …Nikki, Tara…
translation.zh: 妮基、塔拉…

translation.en: When you're a kid, you think it's okay to put yourself in front of your friends
translation.zh: 你还是小孩子的时候 总想把自己置身于朋友之前

translation.en: in pursuit of something better.
translation.zh: 去追求更好的东西

translation.en: A woman knows there is nothing better than your friends.
translation.zh: 但身为女人却明白 没有什么比朋友更棒的了

translation.en: …Kym, Megan, Anya…
translation.zh: 金、梅根、安雅…

translation.en: [Stacy, narrating] When you're a kid,
translation.zh: 你还是小孩子的时候

translation.en: sometimes you think you have to be someone you're not in order to fit in.
translation.zh: 有时候你会认为 为了融入社会 你必须成为另一个人

translation.en: …if I'm being honest, it's probably 'cause we were, like, jealous or something…
translation.zh: 可说实话 可能是因为我们有些嫉妒什么的

translation.en: But a woman knows it's not about hiding who you are.
translation.zh: 但身为女人却明白 你不该隐瞒真实的自己

translation.en: It's about being yourself and speaking your truth.
translation.zh: 而是该作自己 说出自己的真心

translation.en: …but also, you guys can be, like, such a-holes sometimes.
translation.zh: 不过你们有时候也确实太混蛋了

translation.en: Keep it PG in the temple.
translation.zh: 圣殿里不要说脏话

translation.en: Sorry.
translation.zh: 抱歉

translation.en: Where'd she learn to curse like that?
translation.zh: 她从哪里学的这种脏话？

translation.en: No idea.
translation.zh: 不知道

translation.en: [Stacy] And the biggest difference between being a kid and an adult…
translation.zh: 小孩子和成年人之间最大的不同

translation.en: Andy…
translation.zh: 安迪

translation.en: …is knowing what really matters.
translation.zh: 就是明白到底什么最重要

translation.en: I'm gonna keep it brief 'cause I know you can't focus on one thing for that long,
translation.zh: 我长话短说 我知道你没法专注在一件事上太久

translation.en: but you're basic and not nice to people,
translation.zh: 你很庸俗 对人也不友善

translation.en: and if I'm being honest, not that good at soccer.
translation.zh: 而且说实话 你踢球的水平也一般

translation.en: [Aaron] You suck!
translation.zh: 你真烂！

translation.en: And worst of all, because of you,
translation.zh: 最糟糕的是 因为你

translation.en: I ruined my friendship with the one person that matters the most.
translation.zh: 我和对我来说最重要的人闹翻了

translation.en: I need to tell her how bad I messed up.
translation.zh: 我要让她知道 我确实搞砸了

translation.en: Hey, hey, hey… You gotta go up there and finish your Torah portion before you go.
translation.zh: 喂 你离开之前 先回去把《妥拉》选段诵读了

translation.en: Come here. Give it your best shot, and then we'll all fix this together.
translation.zh: 过来 你要全力以赴 然后我们一起解决这件事

translation.en: Hopefully, after I take off this itchy suit.
translation.zh: 希望我能先脱下这件让我发痒的西服

translation.en: You have coffee breath.
translation.zh: 你的口气都是咖啡味

translation.en: Okay. All right. Use that up there. Go.
translation.zh: 好的 那就吸着这个上台吧 去吧

translation.en: Quickly, so quickly, so quickly.
translation.zh: 快点 动作要快

translation.en: So quickly.
translation.zh: 动作要快

translation.en: I did it.
translation.zh: 我做到了

translation.en: Ya'sher koach! Now go!
translation.zh: 恭喜！快去吧！

translation.en: [Stacy] Lydia!
translation.zh: 莉迪亚！

translation.en: [panting] Lydia.
translation.zh: 莉迪亚

translation.en: Lydia.
translation.zh: 莉迪亚

translation.en: Lydia, please open--
translation.zh: 莉迪亚 拜托你开…

translation.en: The Andy stuff.
translation.zh: 安迪那件事

translation.en: I know you never hurt me on purpose.
translation.zh: 我知道你从没有故意伤害我

translation.en: I should have let you apologize.
translation.zh: 我本该给你道歉的机会

translation.en: I miss you, and I love you, and I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 我想你 我爱你 对不起

translation.en: I've been a horrible, selfish friend. Please, please forgive me.
translation.zh: 我一直是个糟糕、自私的朋友 求你了 原谅我

translation.en: Stacy, you ruined my Bat Mitzvah.
translation.zh: 斯泰西 你毁了我的成年礼

translation.en: What part of that do you not understand? I don't under-- Like--
translation.zh: 你怎么还是不明白？我真不懂 就…

translation.en: -I know. -Let me finish.
translation.zh: -我知道 -让我说完

translation.en: That day at the ledge, I told you not to go.
translation.zh: 去岩脊那天 我告诉过你不要去

translation.en: I told you don't jump. You jumped.
translation.zh: 我也让你别跳 结果你跳了

translation.en: Then the whole thing ended up being my fault.
translation.zh: 然后整件事变成了我的错

translation.en: -Then I was the shitty friend? -I'm sorry.
translation.zh: -我成了烂朋友？ -抱歉

translation.en: And I've known you liked Andy for, like, a million years, but guess what, Stacy?
translation.zh: 我知道你一直喜欢安迪 但你猜怎么着 斯泰西？

translation.en: So has every other girl at our school, including me,
translation.zh: 我们学校的其他女生 也包括我 都喜欢他

translation.en: but I never told you anything because I knew it'd just make you upset.
translation.zh: 但我从没跟你说过 因为我知道这会让你难过

translation.en: And then, when you uninvited me to the day I've been helping you plan forever,
translation.zh: 我一直在帮你策划你的派对 结果那天你拒绝邀请我参加

translation.en: I dated him to make you mad.
translation.zh: 我为了气你 故意和他交往

translation.en: Until you ruined it.
translation.zh: 结果你搞砸了

translation.en: Then you ruined your best friend's most important day of her life.
translation.zh: 你搞砸了你挚友人生中最重要的一天

translation.en: So, yeah, I'm… I'm done here, Stacy.
translation.zh: 所以没错 斯泰西 我受够了

translation.en: Wait, you're right.
translation.zh: 等等 你说得对

translation.en: Yeah, I know.
translation.zh: 对 我知道

translation.en: Just come to my Bat Mitzvah party tonight. I promise it'll be worth it. Please.
translation.zh: 今晚来参加我的成年礼派对吧 我保证值得参加 求你了

translation.en: I'm gonna take that as a maybe.
translation.zh: 我就当你在考虑

translation.en: Hello, again.
translation.zh: 又见面了

translation.en: Honey?
translation.zh: 亲爱的？

translation.en: Hi, Mom.
translation.zh: 嗨 妈妈

translation.en: [Bree] Your father called in a lot of favors.
translation.zh: 你爸爸找了很多人帮忙

translation.en: I think it's gonna work out if she shows up.
translation.zh: 如果她去了 我想应该会成功的

translation.en: Come on. Let me do it.
translation.zh: 来 让我来吧

translation.en: I know tonight's not exactly what you dreamed it would be,
translation.zh: 我知道今晚不是你梦寐以求的结果

translation.en: but I'm really proud of you.
translation.zh: 但我真的为你感到骄傲

translation.en: Okay, go.
translation.zh: 好了 这样

translation.en: [Bree] There.
translation.zh: 好了

translation.en: -[Stacy] Hmm. -Gorgeous.
translation.zh: 很漂亮

translation.en: [in accent] Thanks, doll.
translation.zh: 谢谢你 姑娘

translation.en: -I have something for you. -Okay.
translation.zh: -我有件东西要给你 -好

translation.en: [Bree] Okay, now, I know you may not like this, but…
translation.zh: 好吧 我知道你可能不喜欢这个 不过呢

translation.en: [gasping] Really?
translation.zh: 真的吗？

translation.en: Thank you!
translation.zh: 谢谢你！

translation.en: I think I'm gonna wear sneakers.
translation.zh: 我想我还是会穿运动鞋

translation.en: Oh my God, you're a woman. You're a smart woman
translation.zh: 天呐 你成为女人了 而且是聪明的女人

translation.en: Let's party!
translation.zh: 我们去狂欢吧！

translation.en: [Bree] Is she here?
translation.zh: 她来了吗？

translation.en: [exhaling] I don't think she's coming.
translation.zh: 我觉得她不会来了

translation.en: Honey, she's gonna come.
translation.zh: 亲爱的 她会来的

translation.en: [Schmuley] May I have your attention?
translation.zh: 请大家注意

translation.en: It's starting. What if she doesn't come? Then everything's pointless.
translation.zh: 派对开始了 万一她不来呢？ 那一切都没有意义了

translation.en: [Danny] It's not pointless.
translation.zh: 不会没有意义的

translation.en: -I could've been working on my golf game! -Oh, you're fine.
translation.zh: -我本来可以去打高尔夫的 -行了吧 你没事的

translation.en: You made it.
translation.zh: 你来了

translation.en: I made it.
translation.zh: 我来了

translation.en: Perfect timing.
translation.zh: 来得时机正好

translation.en: Just in time for your grand entrance.
translation.zh: 正好赶上你的盛大登场仪式

translation.en: [Schmuley] Listen guys and girls, ladies and gentlemen…
translation.zh: 听好 各位男生女士 女士们先生们

translation.en: No, Lydia…
translation.zh: 不 莉迪亚

translation.en: Please give a very sweet welcome to your Bat Mitzvah
translation.zh: 请大家热烈欢迎她来参加成年礼

translation.en: Lydia Rodriguez Katz!
translation.zh: 莉迪亚罗德里格斯卡茨

translation.en: [Stacy] It's time for yours.
translation.zh: 是你的登场时间到了

translation.en: Stacy, what is this?
translation.zh: 斯泰西 这是怎么回事？

translation.en: You deserve a perfect Bat Mitzvah. One that no one ruins.
translation.zh: 你值得拥有一个完美的成年礼 一个没人毁掉的成年礼

translation.en: So you gave up your Bat Mitzvah for me?
translation.zh: 你为我放弃了自己的成年礼？

translation.en: Stacy, this was your dream.
translation.zh: 斯泰西 这可是你的梦想啊

translation.en: It's our dream.
translation.zh: 是我们的梦想

translation.en: Stacy!
translation.zh: 斯泰西！

translation.en: Yeah, Lydia! We love you!
translation.zh: 没错 莉迪亚 我们爱你！

translation.en: We love you!
translation.zh: 我们爱你！

translation.en: Go!
translation.zh: 去吧！

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: [Stacy] Entrance. Beautiful.
translation.zh: 入场 很棒

translation.en: [Schmuley] Lydia! Lydia! Lydia! [crowd] Lydia!
translation.zh: 莉迪亚！

translation.en: [Schmuley] Come on, Lydia!
translation.zh: 来吧 莉迪亚！

translation.en: Go, Lydia!
translation.zh: 加油 莉迪亚！

translation.en: [Schmuley] All right! Make some noise for Lydia and Stacy!
translation.zh: 好嘞 大家为莉迪亚和斯泰西欢呼！

translation.en: -I'm not paying for this, right? -Yeah. You are.
translation.zh: -我不用付钱吧？ -你得付钱

translation.en: I'm kidding you. You're good. We got this.
translation.zh: 我开玩笑的 没事 我们都搞定了

translation.en: -[Schmuley] Let's get this party started! -Oh man.
translation.zh: -好 我们开始派对吧！ -天啊

translation.en: Guys, you're watching Shawshank Redemp! [chuckling]
translation.zh: 各位 你们在看《肖申克的救赎》！

translation.en: -I love that movie. Have you seen-- -[both] Yeah, we've seen it.
translation.zh: -我超爱那部电影 你们看过… -是的 我们看过了

translation.en: -Yeah, can you leave us alone? -[both] Bye!
translation.zh: -是啊 能让我们单独待一会儿吗？ -再见

translation.en: You're the guy from the movie theater, right? I am.
translation.zh: -你是电影院的那个家伙吗？ -是我

translation.en: Let me get some Twizzlers.
translation.zh: 给我一些扭扭糖

translation.en: -Yeah, give me a lot. -[man] On it.
translation.zh: -多给我一些 -没问题

translation.en: -I just want one. -Okay, my bad.
translation.zh: -我只想要一个 -好吧 抱歉

translation.en: Hell's wrong with you?
translation.zh: 你这人怎么回事？

translation.en: All right, mishpachalah! Who's ready for some "Don't Stop Believing!"?
translation.zh: 好了 家人们 准备好听《别放弃信仰》了吗？

translation.en: Yeah, let's go!
translation.zh: 好耶 开始吧！

translation.en: Of course you are, nerd, and that's why I'm not going to play it.
translation.zh: 我就知道你会这样 呆子 所以我才不会放这首歌

translation.en: I think it's time to slow things down
translation.zh: 是时候放慢一些节奏

translation.en: for a little love jam.
translation.zh: 来一点小小的爱意演奏了

translation.en: [Mateo] Hey.
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: Do you want to dance?
translation.zh: 你想跳舞吗？

translation.en: Well, what about Isabella?
translation.zh: 那伊莎贝拉呢？

translation.en: Who?
translation.zh: 谁？

translation.en: Your 25-year-old girlfriend back in Ecuador?
translation.zh: 你在厄瓜多尔的那位25岁的女朋友？

translation.en: I just assumed her name was something glamorous like Isabella.
translation.zh: 我只是瞎猜她有个动人的名字 比如伊莎贝拉

translation.en: I don't have a girlfriend. You know, it's a weird rumor I don't understand.
translation.zh: 我没有女朋友 这个谣言很怪 我不懂是怎么传的

translation.en: Oh.
translation.zh: 噢

translation.en: [gasping] Ooh, how do you feel about that?
translation.zh: 你的感觉如何？

translation.en: Your daughter's dancing with a handsome young gentleman?
translation.zh: 你女儿跟一位帅哥一起跳舞？

translation.en: Um, surprisingly, I feel okay with it. Really?
translation.zh: -出乎意料 我感觉还不错 -真的吗？

translation.en: -You know what I don't feel good with? -What?
translation.zh: -你知道让我不舒服的是谁吗？ -谁？

translation.en: -Rabbi Rebecca and Cantor Jerry. -[Bree gasping]
translation.zh: 瑞贝卡拉比和杰瑞领唱

translation.en: [Danny] What is that?
translation.zh: 那是什么舞？

translation.en: [Bree] Ooh, work it, Rabbi.
translation.zh: 加油啊 拉比

translation.en: Yeah. That should be against every religion right there.
translation.zh: 是啊 这简直是犯了各种信仰的大忌

translation.en: -Yeah. [laughing] -What are they doing?
translation.zh: -是啊 -他们在干什么？

translation.en: Okay, that's enough of the slow stuff.
translation.zh: 好了 慢节奏音乐到此为止

translation.en: -Let's make some noise everybody! -[crowd cheering]
translation.zh: 大家一起欢呼吧！

translation.en: Are you ready?
translation.zh: 你们准备好了吗？

translation.en: [Stacy, narrating] Dear God, Stacy Friedman here.
translation.zh: 亲爱的上帝 我是斯泰西费曼

translation.en: So today, I'm an adult,
translation.zh: 今天我正式成年了

translation.en: and honestly, it's wonderful.
translation.zh: 说实话 感觉很不错

translation.en: I know this is just the first chapter of my grown-up life,
translation.zh: 我知道这只是我成年人生的第一章

translation.en: and it might not always be this great, but if it was, that would also be great.
translation.zh: 也许人生不会一直这样精彩 但如果能继续精彩 那就太好不过了

translation.en: I mean, no pressure.
translation.zh: 我无意给你压力

translation.en: Not like I could pressure you.
translation.zh: 我也没法给你施加压力

translation.en: Just saying.
translation.zh: 只是说说而已

translation.en: And I know what you're thinking,
translation.zh: 我知道你在想什么

translation.en: that giving up my party for Lydia was my mitzvah project.
translation.zh: 放弃自己的派对而为莉迪亚办 是我的成年礼善行

translation.en: But that's not a mitzvah.
translation.zh: 但那不是善行

translation.en: That's just being a best friend.
translation.zh: 这是我身为挚友的本职

translation.en: ♪ Yeah, turn it up ♪
translation.zh: 对 调大声

translation.en: Welcome to Mitzvah Bakery. All proceeds go to charity.
translation.zh: （善行烘培坊 公义之家犹太会堂） 欢迎来到善行烘培坊 全部收入都会捐给慈善机构

translation.en: [Stacy] Helping others, being selfless, taking the bad and making it good…
translation.zh: 帮助别人 无私无我 接受错事 改为善事…

translation.en: -Breadsticks for four dollars. -Four dollars.
translation.zh: -四美元 -四美元

translation.en: [Stacy] That's a mitzvah.
translation.zh: 这才是善行

translation.en: [girl] Stacy, you did this?
translation.zh: 斯泰西 这是你做的？

translation.en: -This is so dope. -What are you gonna get?
translation.zh: -太棒了 -你打算买什么？

translation.en: [Stacy] Okay, obviously you know that. You're God, which you also know.
translation.zh: 当然了 这些你都知道 你是上帝嘛 这一点你也知道

translation.en: Make sure you say Hamotzi.
translation.zh: 要记得说祝饼词

translation.en: And for one piece, 24 dollars.
translation.zh: 一块24美元

translation.en: [Stacy] Anyway, thanks for being patient with me. I'm really glad I'm a part of this.
translation.zh: 总之 谢谢你对我这么耐心 我很高兴我能参与其中

translation.en: -Ooh, thank you. -You're welcome.
translation.zh: -谢谢 -不客气

translation.en: You're very, very welcome!
translation.zh: 不客气

translation.en: [Stacy] Okay, I'll get back to you. Selling bread.
translation.zh: 好了 我之后再联系你 还得卖面包

translation.en: Now we're talking mitzvah!
translation.zh: 这才是善行嘛！
